docs.text: 基于阶跃响应的无约束控制 ¶ k时刻后输入u不变，即 \(\Delta u(k+i) =0, (i=0,1,\dots)\) 稳定SISO系统的不变输入非零初始状态响应: $$ \begin{align} \begin{bmatrix} y(k)\\y(k+1)\\ \vdots\\y(k+N-1) \end{bmatrix}&= \begin{bmatrix} 0&1&0&\dots&0&0\\ 0&0&1&\dots&0&0\\ \vdots&\vdots&\vdots&&\vdots&\vdots\\ 0&0&0&\dots&0&1\\ 0&0&0&\dots&0&1\\ \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} y(k-1)\\y(k)\\ \vdots\\y(k+N-2) \end{bmatrix} \\ Y(k)\qquad &=\qquad \qquad M_{ss}\qquad \qquad \qquad Y(k-1) \end{align} $$ 零初始状态下 \(y(k-1)=0\) 单位阶跃响应： $$ \begin{align} y(k) &=s_1 \Delta u(k-1)\\ y(k+1) &=s_2 \Delta u(k-1)\\ &\vdots \\ y(k+N-1) &=s_N \Delta u(k-1)\\ y(k+N) &=s_N \Delta u(k-1)\\ \end{align} $$ 单位阶跃响应系数矩阵为 \(S=[s_1,s_2,\dots,s_N]^\top\) ，由线性系统叠加性： $$ Y(k)=M_{ss}Y(k-1)+S \Delta u (k-1) $$ SISO 系统的动态矩阵控制（DMC） ¶ 状态估计： \(Y(k)=M_{ss}Y(k-1)+S_u \Delta u (k-1) +S_d \Delta d (k-1)\) 预测方程： \(Y_p(k+1)=M Y(k)+S_u \Delta U (k) +S_d \Delta d (k)\) 优化问题： $$\min_{\Delta U} J(y(k),\Delta(k),m,p)=\| \Xi_y (Y_p-R)\|^2 +\| \Xi_u \Delta U\|^2 $$ 将解得的优化解的第一个元素作用于系统 （滚动时域，重复进行） SISO 时滞系统的动态矩阵控制（DMC） ¶ \(Su=\begin{bmatrix}0\\ 0\\ \dots \\ s_{\theta_u +1} \\\ s_{\theta_u +2} \\ \dots \\ s_N \end{bmatrix}\) , \(Sd=\begin{bmatrix}0\\ 0\\ \dots \\ s_{\theta_d +1} \\\ s_{\theta_d +2} \\ \dots \\ s_N \end{bmatrix}\) , 单位阶跃响应: \(Y(k)=S_u \Delta u(k-1) + S_d \Delta d(k-1)\) 线性系统任意输入响应: \(Y(k)=M_{ss}Y(k-1)+ S_u \Delta u(k-1) + S_d \Delta d(k-1)\) 预测方程： \(Y_p(k+1)=M_{ss}Y(k)+ S_u \Delta U(k) + S_d \Delta d(k)\) 模型预测控制 陈虹 ↩

BCH 近似 ¶ 1.1 cot 泰勒级数展开 ¶ \[ cot(x)=x^{-1}-\frac{1}{3}x-\frac{1}{45}x^3-\dots--\frac{2^{2n}B_n}{(2n)!}x^{2n-1}-\dots \] \[ B_n为伯努利数，B_0=1,B_1=-0.5,B_2=1/6，\dots \] 伯努利数可以由多项式方程解出，第一项为1, 第二项为0.5或-0.5,之后所有奇数项(从0开始计数)都为0: \[ \sum_{i=0}^{n}C_{n+1}^iB_i=0 \] 2. 李代数微扰直观写法 ¶ \[ \begin{align} &\text{exp}(\Delta \phi^{\wedge})\text{exp}(\phi^{\wedge})\approx \text{exp}((\phi+J_l^{-1}\Delta \phi)^{\wedge})\\ &\text{exp}(\phi^{\wedge})\text{exp}(\Delta \phi^{\wedge})\approx \text{exp}((\phi+J_r^{-1}\Delta \phi)^{\wedge})\\ &\text{反之：}\\ &\text{exp}((\phi+\Delta \phi)^{\wedge})\approx\text{exp}((J_l\Delta \phi)^{\wedge})\text{exp}(\phi^{\wedge}) \\ &\text{exp}((\phi+\Delta \phi)^{\wedge})\approx\text{exp}(\phi^{\wedge})\text{exp}((J_r\Delta \phi)^{\wedge}) \end{align} \]

docs.text: 1. Euclidean Signed Distance Field ¶ Occupancy Grid Map中存放的是是否有障碍物 ESDF中存放的是到最近障碍物的“符号”距离 2. ESDF的建立 ¶ ESDF有很多种建立方案： - 从Grid map 增量式建立(Incremental) - 从TSDF 增量式建立(Incremental) - 从Grid map 批量建立(Batch) 3. 批量建立 ¶ 所有距离可以用二次函数表示，问题转化成了求所有距离二次函数的下包络。 \[ \mathcal{D}(p)=min_{o\in \mathcal{G}} \{(p-o)^2\} \] 其中 \(\mathcal{D}(p)\) 为obstacle distance of grid p \(\mathcal{G}\) 为Grid Map \((p-o)^2\) 为p到o的距离 因此上式求的就是到p最近的障碍物的距离 General Form \[ \mathcal{D}(p)=min_{o\in \mathcal{G}} \{(p-o)^2+ \boxed{f(o)}\} \] \[ \mathcal{D}_f(x,y)=min \{(x-x')^2+(y-y')^2+ f(x',y')\} \]

docs.text: Occupancy grid map 中记录的是栅格是否被占用的信息，每次观测我们都可以知道观测区域内的栅格是否被占用，但观测误差的存在，导致同一个栅格在每次观测的结果可能不同，因此使用贝叶斯滤波进行处理。 1. 贝叶斯滤波 ¶ Notation Definition: A grid in occupancy grid map: \(m_i\) 格子被占用概率: \(p(m_i)\) 格子未被占用概率: \(p(\bar{m}_i)=1-p(\bar{m}_i)\) 观测： \(z\) 马尔可夫性： - \(m_i\) 只与 \(m_{i-1}\) 相关 - \(z_i\) 只与 \(m_{i}\) 相关 \[ \begin{align} p(A|B)&=\frac{p(B|A)p(A)}{p(B)}\\ p(m_i|z_t)&=\frac{p(z_t|m_i)p(m_i)}{p(z_t)}\\ p(m_i|z_{1:t})&=\frac{p(z_t|m_i,z_{1:t-1})p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}\\ 由马尔可夫性：&=\frac{\boxed{p(z_t|m_i)}p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}\\ 对方框贝叶斯展开：&=\frac{\boxed{p(m_i|z_t)p(z_t)}p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{\boxed{p(m_i)}p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}\\ \end{align} \] 同理，将 \(\bar{m}_i\) 也按同样方法写出,对比可得： \[ \begin{align} p(m_i|z_{1:t})&=\frac{p(m_i|z_t)\boxed{p(z_t)}p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(m_i)\boxed{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}}\\ p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})&=\frac{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)\boxed{p(z_t)}p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(\bar{m}_i)\boxed{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}}\\ \Rightarrow \boxed{\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})}}&=\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)}\frac{p(\bar{m}_i)}{p(m_i)}\boxed{\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t-1})}}\\ \Rightarrow \underbrace{\boxed{log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})}}}_{l_t(m_i)} &=log\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)} - \underbrace{log\frac{p(m_i)}{p(\bar{m}_i)}}_{状态的先验：l_0(m_i)} + \underbrace{\boxed{log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t-1})}}}_{l_{t-1}(m_i)}\\ 更新公式：l_t(m_i)&=log\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)}-l_0(m_i)+l_{t-1}(m_i) \end{align} \] \(p(z_t|m_i)\) 是传感器模型， \(p(m_i|z_t)\) 是逆传感器模型, 由贝叶斯公式展开: \[ \begin{align} p(m_i|z_t)&=\frac{p(z_t|m_i)p(m_i)}{p(z_t)}\\ p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)&=\frac{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)p(\bar{m}_i)}{p(z_t)}\\ log\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)}&=log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}+log\frac{p(m_i)}{p(\bar{m}_i)} \end{align} \] 代入之前的更新公式： \[ \begin{align} l_t(m_i)&=log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}+l_0(m_i)-l_0(m_i)+l_{t-1}(m_i)\\ &=\boxed{log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}}+l_{t-1}(m_i)\\ \boxed{log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}}&=\begin{cases} log\dfrac{p(z_t=0|m_i=1)}{p(z_t=0|m_i=0)}=c_0, 观测到格子未占用(z_t=0)\\ log\dfrac{p(z_t=1|m_i=1)}{p(z_t=1|m_i=0)}=c_1, 观测到格子被占用(z_t=1) \end{cases} \end{align} \] \[ \begin{align} l_t(m_i)&=log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})}=log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{1-p(m_i|z_{1:t})}\\ &=log \frac{u}{1-u}定义域(0,1),在(-\infty,+\infty)上单调递增 \end{align} \] \[ 更新公式：l_t(m_i)=\boxed{log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}}+l_{t-1}(m_i) \] 可见每次新的观测进入后，对每一个格子进行更新十分方便，只需要加上一个方框中的项即可，对比最开始的式子，我们本意想求的是格子是否被占用，由于 \(log \frac{u}{1-u}\) 的单调性， \(l_t\) 和 \(m_i\) 是一一对应关系，可以设定一个阈值，当 \(l_t\) 大于某个数 \(m_i=1\) ，当 \(l_t\) 小于某个数 \(m_i=0\) 相比较直接对观测进行累加，滤波之后的map会干净很多

docs.text: Notation Definition: A grid in occupancy grid map: \(m_i\) 格子被占用概率: \(p(m_i)\) 格子未被占用概率: \(p(\bar{m}_i)=1-p(\bar{m}_i)\) 观测： \(z\) 马尔可夫性： - \(m_i\) 只与 \(m_{i-1}\) 相关 - \(z_i\) 只与 \(m_{i}\) 相关 \[ \begin{align} p(A|B)&=\frac{p(B|A)p(A)}{p(B)}\\ p(m_i|z_t)&=\frac{p(z_t|m_i)p(m_i)}{p(z_t)}\\ p(m_i|z_{1:t})&=\frac{p(z_t|m_i,z_{1:t-1})p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}\\ 由马尔可夫性：&=\frac{\boxed{p(z_t|m_i)}p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}\\ 对方框贝叶斯展开：&=\frac{\boxed{p(m_i|z_t)p(z_t)}p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{\boxed{p(m_i)}p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}\\ \end{align} \] 同理，将 \(\bar{m}_i\) 也按同样方法写出,对比可得： \[ \begin{align} p(m_i|z_{1:t})&=\frac{p(m_i|z_t)\boxed{p(z_t)}p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(m_i)\boxed{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}}\\ p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})&=\frac{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)\boxed{p(z_t)}p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(\bar{m}_i)\boxed{p(z_t|z_{1:t-1})}}\\ \Rightarrow \boxed{\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})}}&=\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)}\frac{p(\bar{m}_i)}{p(m_i)}\boxed{\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t-1})}}\\ \Rightarrow \underbrace{\boxed{log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})}}}_{l_t(m_i)} &=log\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)} - \underbrace{log\frac{p(m_i)}{p(\bar{m}_i)}}_{状态的先验：l_0(m_i)} + \underbrace{\boxed{log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t-1})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t-1})}}}_{l_{t-1}(m_i)}\\ 更新公式：l_t(m_i)&=log\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)}-l_0(m_i)+l_{t-1}(m_i) \end{align} \] \(p(z_t|m_i)\) 是传感器模型， \(p(m_i|z_t)\) 是逆传感器模型, 由贝叶斯公式展开: \[ \begin{align} p(m_i|z_t)&=\frac{p(z_t|m_i)p(m_i)}{p(z_t)}\\ p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)&=\frac{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)p(\bar{m}_i)}{p(z_t)}\\ log\frac{p(m_i|z_t)}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_t)}&=log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}+log\frac{p(m_i)}{p(\bar{m}_i)} \end{align} \] 代入之前的更新公式： \[ \begin{align} l_t(m_i)&=log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}+l_0(m_i)-l_0(m_i)+l_{t-1}(m_i)\\ &=\boxed{log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}}+l_{t-1}(m_i)\\ \boxed{log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}}&=\begin{cases} log\dfrac{p(z_t=0|m_i=1)}{p(z_t=0|m_i=0)}=c_0, 观测到格子未占用(z_t=0)\\ log\dfrac{p(z_t=1|m_i=1)}{p(z_t=1|m_i=0)}=c_1, 观测到格子被占用(z_t=1) \end{cases} \end{align} \] \[ \begin{align} l_t(m_i)&=log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{p(\bar{m}_i|z_{1:t})}=log\frac{p(m_i|z_{1:t})}{1-p(m_i|z_{1:t})}\\ &=log \frac{u}{1-u}定义域(0,1),在(-\infty,+\infty)上单调递增 \end{align} \] \[ 更新公式：l_t(m_i)=\boxed{log\frac{p(z_t|m_i)}{p(z_t|\bar{m}_i)}}+l_{t-1}(m_i) \] 可见每次新的观测进入后，对每一个格子进行更新十分方便，只需要加上一个方框中的项即可，对比最开始的式子，我们本意想求的是格子是否被占用，由于 \(log \frac{u}{1-u}\) 的单调性， \(l_t\) 和 \(m_i\) 是一一对应关系，可以设定一个阈值，当 \(l_t\) 大于某个数 \(m_i=1\) ，当 \(l_t\) 小于某个数 \(m_i=0\) 相比较直接对观测进行累加，滤波之后的map会干净很多

DouglasPeucker ( PointList [], epsilon ) // Find the point with the maximum distance dmax = 0 index = 0 end = length ( PointList ) for i = 2 to ( end - 1 ) { d = perpendicularDistance ( PointList [ i ], Line ( PointList [ 1 ], PointList [ end ])) if ( d > dmax ) { index = i dmax = d } } ResultList [] = empty ; // If max distance is greater than epsilon, recursively simplify if ( dmax > epsilon ) { // Recursive call recResults1 [] = DouglasPeucker ( PointList [ 1. .. index ], epsilon ) recResults2 [] = DouglasPeucker ( PointList [ index ... end ], epsilon ) // Build the result list ResultList [] = { recResults1 [ 1. .. length ( recResults1 ) - 1 ], recResults2 [ 1. .. length ( recResults2 )]} } else { ResultList [] = { PointList [ 1 ], PointList [ end ]} } // Return the result return ResultList [] end 3. 时间分配 ¶ 使用梯形速度方案（trapezoidal velocity profile） 给定最大速度，最大加速度和距离，可以解得最小时间。 达到最大速度并减速到0所需距离： \(s_{min}=2 \times \frac{1}{2}a_{max}\dfrac{v^2_{max}}{a^2_{max}}=\dfrac{v^2_{max}}{a_{max}}\) 1. 两点距离不够达到最大速度前并减速到0: \(a_{max}t^2_{half}=s\Rightarrow t_{half}=\sqrt{\dfrac{s}{a_{max}}}\Rightarrow t = 2 t_{half}\) 2. 两点距离足够达到最大速度前并减速到0: \(t=2\dfrac{v_{max}}{a_{max}}+\dfrac{s-s_{min}}{v_{max}}\) const double t = vel / acc ; const double d = 0.5 * acc * t * t ; if ( dist < d + d ){ return 2.0 * sqrt ( dist / acc ); } else { return 2.0 * t + ( dist - 2.0 * d ) / vel ; } 4. minimum snap 解算 ¶ 给定n-1段轨迹中的n个必经点，以及n-1段的时间 BVP求解 state \(\mathbb{s}=[\mathbb{p},\mathbb{v},\mathbb{a}]^\top\) , trajectory \(\mathbb{s}(t)=\mathbb{M}(t)\mathbb{c}\) , in which \(\mathbb{c}=[\mathbb{c_0},\mathbb{c_1},\mathbb{c_2},\mathbb{c_3},\mathbb{c_4},\mathbb{c_5}]^\top,\mathbb{c_i}=[c_{ix},c_{iy},c_{iz}]\) \[ \mathbb{M}(t)= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & t & t^2 & t^3 & t^4 & t^5\\ 0 & 1 & 2t & 3t^2 & 4t^3 & 5t^4\\ 0 & 0 & 2 & 6t & 12t^2 & 20t^3 \end{bmatrix} \] Given \(\mathbb{s}_0,\mathbb{s}_T\) , \[ \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{s}(0)\\ \mathbb{s}(T) \end{bmatrix}_{6\times 3}= \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{M}(0)\\ \mathbb{M}(T) \end{bmatrix}_{6\times 6} \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{c}_0 \end{bmatrix}_{6\times 3} \Rightarrow \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{c}_0 \end{bmatrix} = \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{M}(0)\\ \mathbb{M}(T) \end{bmatrix}^{-1} \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{s}(0)\\ \mathbb{s}(T) \end{bmatrix} \] BIVP求解 state \(\mathbb{s}=[\mathbb{p},\mathbb{v},\mathbb{a}]^\top\) ,intermediate state \(\mathbb{s}_i=[\mathbb{p},\mathbb{v},\mathbb{a},\mathbb{j},\mathbb{s}]^\top\) trajectory \(\mathbb{s}(t)=\mathbb{M}(t)\mathbb{c}\) , in which \(\mathbb{c}=[\mathbb{c_0},\mathbb{c_1},\mathbb{c_2},\mathbb{c_3},\mathbb{c_4},\mathbb{c_5}]^\top\) Boundary M, \[ \mathbb{M}(t)= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & t & t^2 & t^3 & t^4 & t^5\\ 0 & 1 & 2t & 3t^2 & 4t^3 & 5t^4\\ 0 & 0 & 2 & 6t & 12t^2 & 20t^3 \end{bmatrix} \] Intermediate M, \[ \mathbb{M}_i(t)= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & t & t^2 & t^3 & t^4 & t^5\\ 0 & 1 & 2t & 3t^2 & 4t^3 & 5t^4\\ 0 & 0 & 2 & 6t & 12t^2 & 20t^3\\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 6 & 24t & 60t^2\\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 24 & 120t \end{bmatrix} \] Intermediate D, \[ \mathbb{D}_i(t)= \begin{bmatrix} 1 & t & t^2 & t^3 & t^4 & t^5 \end{bmatrix} \] Given \(\mathbb{s}_{start},\mathbb{s}_{end}\) , with \(n_{int}\) intermediate position landmarks \(\mathbb{s}_i\) \[ \begin{align} \mathbb{s}_{start}&=\mathbb{M}(0)\mathbb{c}_0\\ &\vdots\\ \underbrace{ \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{p}_i\\ \mathbb{0} \end{bmatrix}}_{\mathbb{b}_i} &= \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{0}&{\color{red}\mathbb{D}_i(0)}\\ -\mathbb{M}_i(T_i)&\mathbb{M}_i(0) \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{c}_{i-1}\\ \mathbb{c}_i \end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix} {\color{blue}\mathbb{D}_i(T_{i-1})}&\mathbb{0}\\ -\mathbb{M}_i(T_i)&\mathbb{M}_i(0) \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{c}_{i-1}\\ \mathbb{c}_i \end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{E}_i&\mathbb{F}_i \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{c}_{i-1}\\ \mathbb{c}_i \end{bmatrix} \\ &\vdots\\ \mathbb{s}_{end}&=\mathbb{M}(T_{n_{int}})\mathbb{c}_{end}\\ \underbrace{ \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{c}_0\\ \mathbb{c}_1\\ \mathbb{c}_2\\ \vdots\\ \mathbb{c}_{n_{int}} \end{bmatrix} }_{\mathbb{c}} &= \underbrace{ \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{M}(0)&\mathbb{0}&\mathbb{0}&\dots&\mathbb{0}\\ \mathbb{E}_1&\mathbb{F}_1&\mathbb{0}&\dots&\mathbb{0}\\ \mathbb{0}&\mathbb{E}_2&\mathbb{F}_2&\dots&\mathbb{0}\\ \vdots&\vdots&\vdots&\ddots&\vdots\\ \mathbb{0}&\mathbb{0}&\mathbb{0}&\dots&\mathbb{F}_{n_{int}}\\ \mathbb{0}&\mathbb{0}&\mathbb{0}&\dots&\mathbb{M}(T_{n_{int}}) \end{bmatrix}^{-1}}_{A^{-1}} \underbrace{ \begin{bmatrix} \mathbb{s}_{start}\\ \mathbb{b}_1\\ \mathbb{b}_2\\ \vdots\\ \mathbb{b}_{n_{int}}\\ \mathbb{s}_{end} \end{bmatrix} }_{\mathbb{b}}\\ \mathbb{c}_{6N\times 3}&=\mathbb{A}^{-1}_{6N\times 6N}\mathbb{b}_{6N\times 3}\quad, N=n_{int}+1 \end{align} \]

docs.text: 1. 函数导数 ¶ 2. x为标量 ¶ 2.1 F为函数向量： ¶ \[ F=\begin{Bmatrix} F_1(x)\\F_2(x)\\\vdots\\F_n(x) \end{Bmatrix} \qquad \frac{\partial F}{\partial X}=\begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F_1}{\partial X}\\\frac{\partial F_2}{\partial X}\\\vdots\\\frac{\partial F_n}{\partial X} \end{Bmatrix} \] 2.2 F为函数矩阵： ¶ \[ F=\begin{Bmatrix} f_{11}&\dots&f_{1n}\\\vdots&\vdots&\vdots\\f_{m1}&\dots&f_{mn} \end{Bmatrix} \qquad \frac{\partial F}{\partial X}=\begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F_{11}}{\partial X}&\dots&\frac{\partial F_{1n}}{\partial X}\\\vdots&\vdots&\vdots\\\frac{\partial F_{m1}}{\partial X}&\dots&\frac{\partial F_{mn}}{\partial X} \end{Bmatrix} \] 2.2.1 求导法则： ¶ \[ \frac{d[F_1(x)\pm F_2(x)]}{dx}=\frac{dF_1(x)}{dx}\pm \frac{dF_2(x)}{dx}\\ \text{F为函数向量：}\frac{d[F_1^\top(x) F_2(x)]}{dx}=\frac{dF_1^\top(x)}{dx}F_2(x)+ F_1^\top(x)\frac{dF_2(x)}{dx}\\ \text{F为函数矩阵：}\frac{d[F_1(x) F_2(x)]}{dx}=\frac{dF_1(x)}{dx}F_2(x)+ F_1(x)\frac{dF_2(x)}{dx} \] 3. x为n维向量 ¶ 3.1 F标量函数 ¶ 标量 y 对 n 维列向量 x (nx1) 求导，其结果还是一个 *n*维列向量： 标量 y 对 n 维行向量 x (1xn) 求导，其结果还是一个 *n*维行向量 **形状规则：**标量 y 对向量 x 的每个元素求导，然后将各个求导结果按向量 x 的形状排列。 3.2 F为函数向量： ¶ \[ F=\begin{Bmatrix} F_1(x)\\F_2(x)\\\vdots\\F_m(x) \end{Bmatrix} \qquad x=\begin{Bmatrix} x_1\\x_2\\\vdots\\x_n \end{Bmatrix} \qquad \frac{\partial F}{\partial X}= \begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F}{\partial x_1}\\\frac{\partial F}{\partial x_2}\\\vdots\\\frac{\partial F}{\partial x_n} \end{Bmatrix}= \begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F_{1}}{\partial x_1}&\dots&\frac{\partial F_{1}}{\partial x_1}\\\vdots&\vdots&\vdots\\\frac{\partial F_{m}}{\partial x_n}&\dots&\frac{\partial F_{m}}{\partial x_n} \end{Bmatrix} \] 同时, 有: $$ \frac{\partial{F}}{\partial{X}}=\frac{\partial{F}}{\partial{X}^\top}\ \frac{\partial{F^\top}}{\partial{X}}= \begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F^\top}{\partial x_1}&\frac{\partial F^\top}{\partial x_2}&\dots&\frac{\partial F^\top}{\partial x_n} \end{Bmatrix}^\top= \begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F_{1}}{\partial x_1}&\dots&\frac{\partial F_{m}}{\partial x_1}\\vdots&\vdots&\vdots\\frac{\partial F_{1}}{\partial x_n}&\dots&\frac{\partial F_{m}}{\partial x_n} \end{Bmatrix}=[\frac{\partial{F}}{\partial{X \top}}] \top $$ 1）向量 y 的每个元素是标量，先做 y 的每个元素对向量 *x*求导，按照标量对向量的求导规则进行。 2）第一步做好后，将求导结果按 y 的形状排列， 即ny x nx。 3.3 链式法则 ¶ 向量对向量的链式法则与普通标量对标量的相同： $$ (\frac{\partial \mathbf{z} {p\times1}}{\partial \mathbf{x} }) {p\times m}=(\frac{\partial \mathbf{z}}{\partial \mathbf{y}}) (\frac{\partial \mathbf{y}}{\partial \mathbf{x}}) {n\times m} $$ 标量对向量的链式法则需要取一个转置： $$ (\frac{\partial z }{\partial \mathbf{x} {m\times1}}) =(\frac{\partial \mathbf{y}}{\partial \mathbf{x}} {n\times m})^\top (\frac{\partial z}{\partial \mathbf{y}}) {n\times 1}\ (\frac{\partial z }{\partial \mathbf{a} {a\times1}}) =(\frac{\partial \mathbf{y}}{\partial \mathbf{x}} {y\times x} \dots \frac{\partial \mathbf{c}}{\partial \mathbf{b}} \frac{\partial \mathbf{b}}{\partial \mathbf{a}} {b\times a} )^\top (\frac{\partial z}{\partial \mathbf{y}})_{y\times 1} $$ 3.4 F为函数矩阵： ¶ \[ F=\{{f_{ij}}\}_{nl}\\ \frac{\partial F}{\partial X}= \begin{Bmatrix} \frac{\partial F}{\partial x_1}\\\frac{\partial F}{\partial The Trajectory Optimization Problem ¶ single-phase continuous-time trajectory optimization problems $$ \text{system dynamics:\qquad} \dot{x}(t) = f(t, x(t), u(t))\ \text{path constraint:\qquad} h(t, x(t), u(t)) ≤ 0\ \text{boundary constraint:\qquad} g(t_0, t_F , x(t_0), x(t_F )≤ 0\ \text{path bound on state:\qquad} xlow ≤ x(t) ≤ xupp\ \text{path bound on control:\qquad} ulow ≤ u(t) ≤ uupp\ \text{bounds on initial and final time:\qquad} tlow ≤ t0 < tF ≤ tupp\ \text{bound on initial state:\qquad} x0,low ≤ x(t0) ≤ x0,upp\ \text{bound on final state:\qquad} xF,low ≤ x(tF ) ≤ xF,upp $$ 两个配置点之间的状态变化等于系统动力学的积分，而积分在被积函数不确定时，用始末值计算梯形面积代替定积分： $$ xk+1 − xk ≈ 1 2(hk)(νk+1 + νk) $$ 2. Unconstrained case: BVP ¶ \[ min \int_0^T v(t)^\top W v(t) dt \\ s.t. z^{(s)}(t)=v(t)\\ z{[s-1]}(t_0)=z_0\\ z{[s-1]}(t_M)=z_f \] *最优条件：s阶导数作为优化量: 轨迹为2s-1 阶多项式，eg: s=3 minimize jerk (angular velocity, thrust): 5 degree polynomial s=4 minimize snap(angular acc, torque): 7 degree 生成轨迹可行性检验： 离散时间法: 高分辨率较慢，低分辨率可能检测不到（间隔太大） Recursive Bound Checker: 仅限 degree 5， 分辨率相关 extreme Value Checker：数值解（慢），degree5 更好方法：（针对多元多项式） \[ 满足约束 \Leftrightarrow \mathscr{G}(t)<0, t\in[0,T]\\ \text{Check t=0 and t=T, if satisfied,} \Leftrightarrow \mathscr{G}(t)=0 \text{ has roots in (0,T)} \] Sturm Theory，检查多项式根的存在性 Position - Velocity - Acceleration - Jerk - Snap - Crackle - Pop 3. Unconstrained case: BIVP (中间点) ¶ BVP中的起始点所有量都必须指定，BIVP只指定部分中间点条件（给定节点p，自动优化v,a,j）更顺滑。

docs.text: 参考文章： A Tutorial on Particle Filters for Online Nonlinear/Non-Gaussian Bayesian Tracking 贝叶斯滤波，目的是构造后验估计的概率密度函数。 对许多问题来说，每次新的观测后都需要一个新的估计，因此一个简单的解决方法是使用递归滤波器(recursive filter)：A recursive filtering approach means that received data can be processed sequentially rather than as a batch so that it is not necessary to store the complete data set nor to reprocess existing data if a new measurement becomes available 非线性跟踪问题，最优估计在特定的约束条件下是可以直接求解的，例如卡尔曼滤波Kalman filter和网格滤波grid-based filter。但很多情况下不可解，此时就需要扩展卡尔曼滤波，近似网格滤波和粒子滤波。 跟踪问题的定义： ¶ 预测: ¶ 跟踪的目标就是循环的由测量： 来获得状态xk的最优估计。 从贝叶斯的角度来看的话，已知系统状态的先验估计： ，就是通过Chapman–Kolmogorov equation获得后验概率密度函数： 其中用到了markov假设 \(p(x_k|x_{k-1}, z_{1:k-1})=p(x_k|x_{k-1})\) 且 \(z_k\) 只与 \(x_k\) 相关。 其中 \(p(x_k|x_{k-1})\) 是通过状态方程得到，同时，系统噪声的分布 \(v_{k-1}\) 也是已知的。 证明： $$ \begin{align*} \text{联合密度:}\quad p(x_{k},x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})&=p(x_{k}|x_{k-1},z_{1:k-1})p(x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})\\ \text{马尔科夫条件:}\quad p(x_{k},x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})&=p(x_{k}|x_{k-1})p(x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})\\ \text{左边对 \(x_{k-1}\) 求边缘概率:}\quad \int p(x_{k},x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})dx_{k-1} &=\int p(x_{k}|x_{k-1})p(x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1}) d x_{k-1}\\ p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1})&=\int p(x_{k}|x_{k-1})p(x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1}) d x_{k-1}\\ \end{align*} $$ 更新 ¶ 在k时刻，测量 \(z_k\) 被用于通过贝叶斯公式更新先验估计： 证明： $$ \begin{align*} p(x_{k}|z_{1:k})&=p(x_{k}|z_{k},z_{1:k-1})\\ \text{条件概率:}\quad p(x_{k}|z_{k},z_{1:k-1})p(z_{k}|z_{1:k-1})&=p(x_{k},z_{k}|z_{1:k-1})\\ p(x_{k}|z_{k},z_{1:k-1})&=\frac{p(x_{k},z_{k}|z_{1:k-1})}{p(z_{k}|z_{1:k-1})}\\ \text{条件概率:}\quad p(x_{k}|z_{k},z_{1:k-1})&=\frac{p(z_{k}|x_{k},z_{1:k-1})p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1})}{p(z_{k}|z_{1:k-1})}\\ \text{马尔科夫条件:}\quad p(x_{k}|z_{k},z_{1:k-1})&=\frac{p(z_{k}|x_{k})p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1})}{p(z_{k}|z_{1:k-1})}\\ \end{align*} $$ 其中： 证明： $$ x \begin{align*}\text{联合密度:}\quad p(x_{k},z_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})&=p(z_{k}|x_{k},z_{1:k-1})p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1})\\ \text{马尔科夫条件:}\quad p(x_{k},z_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})&=p(z_{k}|x_{k})p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1})\\ \text{左边对 \(x_{k-1}\) 求边缘概率:}\quad \int p(x_{k},z_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})dx_{k} &=\int p(z_{k}|x_{k})p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1}) d x_{k}\\ p(z_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1}) &=\int p(z_{k}|x_{k})p(x_{k}|z_{1:k-1}) d x_{k}\\ \end{align*} $$ 最优解 ¶ A.卡尔曼滤波器 ¶ \(p(x_{k-1}|z_{1:k-1})\) 是高斯分布，则 \(p(x_{k}|z_{1:k})\) 也是高斯分布 约束：1. \(v_{k-1}\) 和 \(n_k\) 满足高斯分布 2.线性状态方程 3.线性观测方程 B.网格滤波器 ¶ 近似最优解 ¶ A.扩展卡尔曼滤波器 ¶ B.近似网格滤波器 ¶ 粒子滤波器 ¶ Sequential Importance Sampling ¶

docs.text: 这周在实现DRQN的时候踩了很多坑，在此记录一下。 首先是在实现的时候选择了GRU而不是LSTM，GRU是LSTM的一个常用变种，参数比LSTM少一些。 {%asset_img 2.png 400 300 "LSTM" %} {%asset_img 3.png 400 300 "GRU" %} 对于GRU层， pytorch实现 为： \(\begin{array}{ll} r_t = \sigma(W_{ir} x_t + b_{ir} + W_{hr} h_{(t-1)} + b_{hr}) \\ z_t = \sigma(W_{iz} x_t + b_{iz} + W_{hz} h_{(t-1)} + b_{hz}) \\ n_t = \tanh(W_{in} x_t + b_{in} + r_t * (W_{hn} h_{(t-1)}+ b_{hn})) \\ h_t = (1 - z_t) * n_t + z_t * h_{(t-1)} \end{array}\) 这里每层都多了一个bias项，其中 \(r_t\) 是reset gate, \(z_t\) 是update gate，注意这两个都是sigmoid激活，范围是0~1。 对于 \(n_t\) ， \(r_t\) 接近1时， \(n_t = \tanh(W_{in} x_t + b_{in} + r_t * (W_{hn} h_{(t-1)}+ b_{hn}))\) ， \(r_t\) 接近0时， \(n_t = \tanh(W_{in} x_t + b_{in})\) ，因此 \(r_t\) 称为reset gate, 控制 \(h_{(t-1)}\) 是否参与更新。相加后经过一层tanh变成-1~1范围。 对于 \(h_t\) ， \(z_t\) 接近1时， \(h_t=h_{(t-1)}\) ， \(z_t\) 接近0时， \(h_t=n_t\) ，因此 \(z_t\) 称为update gate。 在pytorch中, GRU的输入shape: \((batch\_size, seq\_len , input\_size)\) when batch_first=True, \((seq\_len, batch, input\_size)\) when batch_first=False. 隐变量shape: $(D * \text{num_layers}, batch_size, output_size) $， 初始化时会用到。D=2 if bidirectional=True otherwise 1 输出shape: \((seqlen, batch size, D * outputsize)\) 此处输出为3维，因此如果Qnet使用单帧输入，shape会是 \((1,*,*)\) , 需要sqeeze(0)后才能使用。 经验回放时需要注意不要使seqlen超过episode的长度。

docs.text: 1. 基础知识 ¶ 1.1 给予马尔科夫假设的条件概率 ¶ 马尔科夫关系：A-B-C P(A,B,C)=P(C|B,A)P(B,A)=P(C|B)P(B|A)P(A) P(B,C|A)=P(C|B,A)P(B|A)=P(C|B)P(B|A) 1.2 KL散度 ¶ \[ D_{KL}(p\|q)=\sum p(x_i)(\log p(x_i)-\log(q_i))= \mathbb{E}_{x \sim p(x)}[\log p(x_i)-\log(q_i)]=\mathbb{E}_{x_i \sim p(x)}[\log \frac{p(x_i)}{ q(x_i)}] \] 两个高斯分布 \(p\sim(\mu_1,\sigma_1^2)\) 和 \(q\sim(\mu_2,\sigma_2^2)\) 的KL散度公式： \[ KL(p,q)=log \frac{\sigma_2}{\sigma_1}+\frac{\sigma_1^2+(\mu_1-\mu_2)^2}{2\sigma_2^2}-\frac{1}{2} \] 1.3 参数重整化 Reparameterization ¶ VAE和Diffusion中一种大量使用的技巧。 假设我们有一个神经网络预测出了一个高斯分布 \(N(\mu,\sigma^2)\) ，如果我们直接进行采样，得到的结果和原先神经网络的参数之间的梯度链接就断开了，因为采样过程是不可导的。 为了保证样本和原先参数之间梯度的连续性，从一个标准分布进行采样z，将其当做常数，然后将均值和方差进行仿射变换 \(y=\sigma*z+\mu\) ，由此 \(\frac{\partial y}{\partial \sigma}\) 和 \(\frac{\partial y}{\partial \mu}\) 就都可以计算了。 2. VAE回顾 ¶ 2.1 单层VAE和置信下界 ¶ graph LR; X((x)) -."q(z|x)".-> Z((z)); Z --"p(x|z)"-->X; 训练的时候从x生成z，推理的时候从z预测x \[ \begin{align} &联合概率分布积分得到x的边缘概率分布：&p(x)&=\int_z p(x,z)=\int_z p_\theta (x|z)p(z)\\ &上下同乘q: &p(x)&=\int_z q_\phi(z|x) \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ &相当于方框中的部分在q分布下的期望：&p(x)&=\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ &同取log：&\log p(x)&=\log \mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ &Jensen 不等式：&\log p(x)&\geq \mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ \end{align} \] 目标：最大化p(x)的似然估计，相当于最大化下界 \[ \begin{align} &下界(ELBO)=&\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}&=\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log p_\theta (x|z)-\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log\dfrac{q_\phi(z|x)}{p(z)}\\ &&&=\underbrace{\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log p_\theta (x|z)}_{\text{reconstruction loss}}-D_{KL} (q_\phi(z|x)\|p(z)) \end{align} \] 由于高斯分布的KL散度可以写出表达式，因此单层VAE的置信下界也是可以写出的。 EM法最大化ELBO： 1. 固定 \(\theta\) , 先求使ELBO最大的qz*,reconstruction loss与qz无关 2. 带入qz*，求使ELBO最大的 \(\theta\) 2.2 多层VAE和置信下界 ¶ graph LR; X((x)) -."q(z|x)".-> Z1((z1)); Z1 --"p(x|z)"-->X; Z1 -."q(z2|z1)".-> Z2((z2)); Z2 --"p(z1|z2)"-->Z1; 推导过程同单层一样： \[ \begin{align} &联合概率分布积分得到x的边缘概率分布：&p(x)&=\int_{z_1}\int_{z_2} p_\theta(x,z_1,z_2)\\ &上下同乘q: &p(x)&=\int_{z_1}\int_{z_2} q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x) \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x,z_1,z_2)}{q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x)}}\\ &同取log：&\log p(x)&=\log \mathbb{E}_{z_1,z_2\sim q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x)} \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x,z_1,z_2)}{q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x)}}\\ &Jensen 不等式：&\log p(x)&\geq \mathbb{E}_{z_1,z_2\sim q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x)} \log \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x,z_1,z_2)}{q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x)}}\\ &马尔科夫关系： &p(x,z_1,z_2)&=p(x|z_1)p(z_1|z_2)p(z_2)\\ &&q(z_1,z_2|x)&=q(z1|x)q(z2|z1)\\ \end{align}\\ \] \[ \mathcal{L}(\theta,\phi)= \mathbb{E}_{z_1,z_2\sim q_\phi(z_1,z_2|x)}[\log p(x|z_1)+ \log p(z_1|z_2)+ \log p(z_2) -\log q(z1|x) -\log q(z2|z1) ] \] 3. Diffusion Model ¶ graph LR; XT((xT)) -..-> xt1((xt)); xt1 --"p(xt-1|xt)"-->xt2((xt-1)); xt2 -..-> x0((x0)); xt2 --"q(xt|xt-1)"-->xt1; Diffusion模型有两个过程： 1. 扩散过程(正向) \(q(x^{0 \dots T})\) 2. 拟扩散过程(逆向) \(p(x^{0 \dots T})\) 3.1 扩散过程 ¶ 给定初始分布 \(x_0\sim q(x)\) ，不断向分布中添加高斯噪声（仿射变换），这是一个马尔科夫过程，每次加噪的标准差是由固定值 \(\beta_t\) 确定，均值由 \(\beta_t\) 和t时刻数据 \(x_t\) 决定。随着t的增大，最终分布 \(x_t\) 变成了一个各项独立的高斯分布。 \[ q(x_t|x_{t-1})=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{1-\beta_t}x_{t-1},\beta_t \mathbf{I}) \quad q(x_{1:T}|x_0)=\prod_{t=1}^T q(x_t|x_{t-1}) \] \(x_t\) 是从 \(x_{t-1}\) 经过仿射变化后的分布中中采样得到，即一个均值为 \(\sqrt {1-\beta_t} x_{t-1}\) 和方差 \(\beta_t\) 的高斯分布，采样的时候使用重参数化技巧保证过程的梯度连续，即 \(x_t=\sqrt {1-\beta_t} x_{t-1}+\sqrt{\beta_t} z_{t-1}\) , z 为标准分布采样得到， \(z\sim N(0,I)\) 。 \(\beta_t\) 是一个(0,1)之间的数，可以设置为递增的序列。 实际上这个过程是有闭式解得，不需要每次去迭代计算： Info 两个正态分布 \(X\sim \mathcal{N}(\mu_1,\sigma_1^2)\) 和 \(Y\sim \mathcal{N}(\mu_2,\sigma_2^2)\) 线性叠加：aX+bY 均值 \(a\mu_1+b\mu_2\) 方差 \(a^2\sigma_1^2+b^2\sigma_2^2\) \[ \begin{align} a_t&=1-\beta_t\\ x_t&=\sqrt {1-\beta_t} x_{t-1}+\sqrt{\beta_t} z_{t-1}\\ \Rightarrow x_t&=\sqrt a_t x_{t-1} +\sqrt{1-a_t} z_{t-1}\\ x_{t-1} &=\sqrt a_{t-1} x_{t-2} +\sqrt{1-a_{t-1}} z_{t-2}\\ \Rightarrow x_t&= \sqrt {a_t a_{t-1}} x_{t-2} +\underbrace{\sqrt{a_t-a_ta_{t-1}} z_{t-2}+\sqrt{1-a_t} z_{t-1}}_{均值0，方差a_t-a_ta_{t-1}+1-a_t=1-a_ta_{t-1}}\\ &=\sqrt {a_t a_{t-1}} x_{t-2} +\sqrt{1-a_ta_{t-1}} \bar{z}_{t-2}\\ &=\dots\\ &=\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z\\ 其中，\bar{a_t}&=\prod_1^Ta_i\\ 因此，q(x_t|x_0)&=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0,1-\bar{a_t} I) \end{align} \] 因此扩散过程是一个完全不含神经网络参数的过程，每一步都是可以直接计算出来的。并且扩散过程中维度保持一致。 3.2 逆扩散过程 ¶ 逆过程从高斯噪声中恢复原始数据。 通过逆转先前的过程，我们可以从纯高斯噪声( \(\mathcal{N}(0,1)\) )中恢复原来的信息。但是 \(q(x_{t-1}|x_t)\) 很难估计，因此用一个 \(p_\theta\) 对的模型来拟合这些条件概率。 \[ p_{\theta}(x_{0:T})=p(x_T)\prod_{t=1}^{T}p_{\theta}(x_{t-1}|x_t)\\ p_{\theta}(x_{t-1}|x_t)=\mathcal{N}(x_{t-1};\mu_\theta(x_t,t),\Sigma_\theta(x_t,t)) \] Info 高斯概率密度函数： \[ f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi \sigma^2}}exp(-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}) \] \(ax^2+bx=a(x+\frac{b}{2a})^2+C\) 若这是正态分布的指数项，对比可得： \(-1/2\sigma^2=a\) ， \(\mu=-b/2a\) C就是幅值相关的项了 \(q(x_t|x_{t-1})=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{a_t} x_{t-1},\beta_t I)\) \(q(x_t|x_0)=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0,1-\bar{a_t} I)\) 后验的扩散条件概率： \[ \begin{align} q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)&=\mathcal{N}(x_{t-1};\tilde \mu_\theta(x_t,x_0),\tilde \beta_t I)\\ 贝叶斯公式：q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)&=q(x_t|x_{t-1},x_0)\frac{q(x_{t-1},x_0)}{q(x_t,x_0)}\\ &=q(x_t|x_{t-1},x_0)\frac{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)\cancel{q(x_0)}}{q(x_t|x_0)\cancel{q(x_0)}}\\ 马尔可夫性:&=q(x_t|x_{t-1})\frac{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)}{q(x_t|x_0)}\\ &\propto exp(-\frac{1}{2}[ \dfrac{(x_t-\sqrt{a_t} x_{t-1})^2}{\beta_t} +\dfrac{(x_{t-1}-\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}} x_{0})^2}{1-\bar a_{t-1}} -\dfrac{(x_t-\sqrt{\bar a_t} x_{0})^2}{1-\bar a_t}] )\\ &= exp( \underbrace{-\frac{1}{2}(\dfrac{a_t}{\beta_t}+\dfrac{1}{1-\bar a_{t-1}})}_{a}x_{t-1}^2 +\underbrace{(\dfrac{\sqrt{a_t}}{\beta_t}x_t+\dfrac{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}{1-\bar a_t} x_{0})}_{b}x_{t-1}+C(x_0,x_t) )\\ 由上面的条件2可知：\quad 方差 \bar \beta_t &=-\frac{1}{2a}\\ &=\dfrac{1}{\dfrac{a_t}{\beta_t}+\dfrac{1}{1-\bar a_{t-1}}}\\ &=\dfrac{1-\bar a_{t-1}}{1-\bar a_t} \beta_t\\ 均值：\tilde \mu(x_t,x_0)&=-\frac{b}{2a}\\ &=\dfrac{(\dfrac{\sqrt{a_t}}{\beta_t}x_t+\dfrac{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}{1-\bar a_t}x_0)}{(\dfrac{a_t}{\beta_t}+\dfrac{1}{1-\bar a_{t-1}})}\\ &=\dfrac{\sqrt{ a_t}(1-\bar a_{t-1})}{1-\bar a_t} x_t +\dfrac{\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}}\beta_t}{1-\bar a_t} x_0 \end{align} \] 由之前计算的 \(x_t=\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z\) ，可以反推： \[ x_0=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}}(x_t-\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z_t) \] 代入均值表达式中： \[ \begin{align} \tilde \mu(x_t,x_0)&=\dfrac{\sqrt{a_t}(1-\bar a_{t-1})}{1-\bar a_t} x_t +\dfrac{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}}}\beta_t}{1-\bar a_t} \frac{1}{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}}}(x_t-\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z_t)\\ &=\boxed{\frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}}(\dfrac{a_t(1-\bar a_{t-1})}{1-\bar a_t} +\dfrac{\beta_t}{1-\bar a_t})x_t-\dfrac{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}}}\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}}} \frac{1}{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}}} z_t\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}\cancel{(\dfrac{\cancel{a_t}-\bar a_{t}+1-\cancel{a_t}}{1-\bar a_t} )}x_t- \frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}\dfrac{\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}}} z_t\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}(x_t-\dfrac{\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}}}z_t) \end{align} \] 3.3 目标分布的似然函数 ¶ 使用负对数似然： \(-\log p_\theta (x_0)\) , 为了让 \(p_\theta (x_0)\) 最大化，负对数似然需要最小化，由此，需要构造出一个置信上界，并最小化这个上界： \[ \begin{align} -\log p_\theta (x_0) &\leq -\log p_\theta (x_0)+ D_{KL}(q(x_{1:T}|x_0)\|p_\theta(x_{1:T}|x_0))\\ &= -\log p_\theta (x_0)+ \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{1:T}|x_0)}]\\ &=-\log p_\theta (x_0)+ \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})/p_\theta(x_{0})}]\\ &=-\log p_\theta (x_0)+ \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}+\underbrace{\log p_\theta(x_{0})}_{与q分布无关，可以放到期望外面}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]\\ 两边同时对q(x_0)取期望：-\mathbf{E}_{q(x_0)}\log p_\theta (x_0)&\leq \mathbf{E}_{q(x_0)} \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]\\ &= \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]=L_{VLB} \end{align} \] Info 根据马尔可夫性和贝叶斯公式可以把 \(q(x_t|x_{t-1})\) 写成 \(x_{t-1}\) 的条件概率估计。 \[ \begin{align} q(x_t|x_{t-1})&=q(x_t|x_{t-1},x_0)=\dfrac{q(x_t,x_{t-1},x_0)}{q(x_{t-1},x_0)}\\ &=\dfrac{q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)q(x_t|x_0)q(x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)q(x_0)}\\ &=\dfrac{q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)q(x_t|x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)} \end{align} \] 化简 \(L_{VLB}\) ： \[ \begin{align} L_{VLB}&=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \frac{\prod_1^T q(x_t|x_{t-1})}{p_\theta(x_T)\prod_1^Tp_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)（逆过程）}]\\ 对数乘法变加法：&=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_1^T \log \frac{ q(x_t|x_{t-1})}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}]\\ 取出t=1的项： &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\frac{ q(x_t|x_{t-1})}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_0|x_1)}]\\ 应用上面提示的性质：&=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}\dfrac{q(x_t|x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}+\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{q(x_t|x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}\\&+\log \dfrac{\cancel{q(x_{2}|x_0)}\cancel{q(x_{3}|x_0)}\dots q(x_{T}|x_0)}{q(x_{1}|x_0)\cancel{q(x_{2}|x_0)}\dots \cancel{q(x_{T-1}|x_0)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}\\ &+\log {q(x_{T}|x_0)} - \cancel{\log{q(x_{1}|x_0)} + \log{ q(x_1|x_0)}}-\log{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \dfrac{q(x_{T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_T)} +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}} -\log{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[D_{KL}(q(x_{T}|x_0)\|p_\theta(x_T)) +\sum_2^TD_{KL}(q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)\|p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)) -\log{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[L_T+\sum_2^T L_{t-1}-L_0]\\ 由于q(x_0|x_1,x_0)=1，计算时L_0可以放入第二项中： &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[L_T+\sum_1^T L_{t-1}] \end{align} \] \(L_T\) 是不含参的，论文中又把 \(p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)\) 的方差设为了和 \(\beta\) 相关的常数，因此可训练的参数只存在于均值之中 由于 \(q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)\) 和 \(p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)\) 的均值方差都知道，因此 \(L_{t-1}\) 的KL散度一定可求。 \[ \begin{align} L_{t-1}&=D_{KL}(q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)\|p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t))\\ &=\frac{(\mu_1-\mu_2)^2}{2\sigma_2^2}+\underbrace{\frac{\sigma_1^2}{2\sigma_2^2}+log \frac{\sigma_2}{\sigma_1}-\frac{1}{2}}_{常数}\\ L_{t-1}-C&=\mathbf{E}_q [\frac{1}{2\sigma_2^2}(\tilde \mu_t-\mu_\theta)^2]\\ \mu_\theta(x_t,t)&=\tilde \mu(x_t,\frac{1}{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}(x_t-\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}\epsilon_\theta(x_t)))\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}(x_t-\frac{\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}}\epsilon_\theta(x_t))\\ \Rightarrow&\mathbf{E}_{x_o,\epsilon}[\dfrac{\beta_t^2}{2\sigma_t^2a_t(1-\bar a_t)}\|\epsilon -\epsilon_\theta(\sqrt{\bar a_t}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}\epsilon,t)\|]\\ L_{simple}(\theta) &\triangleq \mathbf{E}_{t,x_o,\epsilon}[\|\epsilon -\epsilon_\theta(\sqrt{\bar a_t}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}\epsilon,t)\|]\\ \end{align} \]

docs.text: \[ D_{KL}(p\|q)=\sum p(x_i)(\log p(x_i)-\log(q_i))= \mathbb{E}_{x \sim p(x)}[\log p(x_i)-\log(q_i)]=\mathbb{E}_{x_i \sim p(x)}[\log \frac{p(x_i)}{ q(x_i)}] \] 两个高斯分布 \(p\sim(\mu_1,\sigma_1^2)\) 和 \(q\sim(\mu_2,\sigma_2^2)\) 的KL散度公式： \[ KL(p,q)=log \frac{\sigma_2}{\sigma_1}+\frac{\sigma_1^2+(\mu_1-\mu_2)^2}{2\sigma_2^2}-\frac{1}{2} \]
docs.title: 1.2 KL散度

docs.text: VAE和Diffusion中一种大量使用的技巧。 假设我们有一个神经网络预测出了一个高斯分布 \(N(\mu,\sigma^2)\) ，如果我们直接进行采样，得到的结果和原先神经网络的参数之间的梯度链接就断开了，因为采样过程是不可导的。 为了保证样本和原先参数之间梯度的连续性，从一个标准分布进行采样z，将其当做常数，然后将均值和方差进行仿射变换 \(y=\sigma*z+\mu\) ，由此 \(\frac{\partial y}{\partial \sigma}\) 和 \(\frac{\partial y}{\partial \mu}\) 就都可以计算了。

docs.text: graph LR; X((x)) -."q(z|x)".-> Z((z)); Z --"p(x|z)"-->X; 训练的时候从x生成z，推理的时候从z预测x \[ \begin{align} &联合概率分布积分得到x的边缘概率分布：&p(x)&=\int_z p(x,z)=\int_z p_\theta (x|z)p(z)\\ &上下同乘q: &p(x)&=\int_z q_\phi(z|x) \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ &相当于方框中的部分在q分布下的期望：&p(x)&=\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ &同取log：&\log p(x)&=\log \mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ &Jensen 不等式：&\log p(x)&\geq \mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}\\ \end{align} \] 目标：最大化p(x)的似然估计，相当于最大化下界 \[ \begin{align} &下界(ELBO)=&\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log \boxed{\dfrac{p_\theta (x|z)p(z)}{q_\phi(z|x)}}&=\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log p_\theta (x|z)-\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log\dfrac{q_\phi(z|x)}{p(z)}\\ &&&=\underbrace{\mathbb{E}_{z\sim q_\phi(z|x)} \log p_\theta (x|z)}_{\text{reconstruction loss}}-D_{KL} (q_\phi(z|x)\|p(z)) \end{align} \] 由于高斯分布的KL散度可以写出表达式，因此单层VAE的置信下界也是可以写出的。 EM法最大化ELBO： 1. 固定 \(\theta\) , 先求使ELBO最大的qz*,reconstruction loss与qz无关 2. 带入qz*，求使ELBO最大的 \(\theta\)

docs.title: 3. Diffusion Model

docs.text: 给定初始分布 \(x_0\sim q(x)\) ，不断向分布中添加高斯噪声（仿射变换），这是一个马尔科夫过程，每次加噪的标准差是由固定值 \(\beta_t\) 确定，均值由 \(\beta_t\) 和t时刻数据 \(x_t\) 决定。随着t的增大，最终分布 \(x_t\) 变成了一个各项独立的高斯分布。 \[ q(x_t|x_{t-1})=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{1-\beta_t}x_{t-1},\beta_t \mathbf{I}) \quad q(x_{1:T}|x_0)=\prod_{t=1}^T q(x_t|x_{t-1}) \] \(x_t\) 是从 \(x_{t-1}\) 经过仿射变化后的分布中中采样得到，即一个均值为 \(\sqrt {1-\beta_t} x_{t-1}\) 和方差 \(\beta_t\) 的高斯分布，采样的时候使用重参数化技巧保证过程的梯度连续，即 \(x_t=\sqrt {1-\beta_t} x_{t-1}+\sqrt{\beta_t} z_{t-1}\) , z 为标准分布采样得到， \(z\sim N(0,I)\) 。 \(\beta_t\) 是一个(0,1)之间的数，可以设置为递增的序列。 实际上这个过程是有闭式解得，不需要每次去迭代计算： Info 两个正态分布 \(X\sim \mathcal{N}(\mu_1,\sigma_1^2)\) 和 \(Y\sim \mathcal{N}(\mu_2,\sigma_2^2)\) 线性叠加：aX+bY 均值 \(a\mu_1+b\mu_2\) 方差 \(a^2\sigma_1^2+b^2\sigma_2^2\) \[ \begin{align} a_t&=1-\beta_t\\ x_t&=\sqrt {1-\beta_t} x_{t-1}+\sqrt{\beta_t} z_{t-1}\\ \Rightarrow x_t&=\sqrt a_t x_{t-1} +\sqrt{1-a_t} z_{t-1}\\ x_{t-1} &=\sqrt a_{t-1} x_{t-2} +\sqrt{1-a_{t-1}} z_{t-2}\\ \Rightarrow x_t&= \sqrt {a_t a_{t-1}} x_{t-2} +\underbrace{\sqrt{a_t-a_ta_{t-1}} z_{t-2}+\sqrt{1-a_t} z_{t-1}}_{均值0，方差a_t-a_ta_{t-1}+1-a_t=1-a_ta_{t-1}}\\ &=\sqrt {a_t a_{t-1}} x_{t-2} +\sqrt{1-a_ta_{t-1}} \bar{z}_{t-2}\\ &=\dots\\ &=\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z\\ 其中，\bar{a_t}&=\prod_1^Ta_i\\ 因此，q(x_t|x_0)&=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0,1-\bar{a_t} I) \end{align} \] 因此扩散过程是一个完全不含神经网络参数的过程，每一步都是可以直接计算出来的。并且扩散过程中维度保持一致。
docs.title: 3.1 扩散过程

docs.text: 逆过程从高斯噪声中恢复原始数据。 通过逆转先前的过程，我们可以从纯高斯噪声( \(\mathcal{N}(0,1)\) )中恢复原来的信息。但是 \(q(x_{t-1}|x_t)\) 很难估计，因此用一个 \(p_\theta\) 对的模型来拟合这些条件概率。 \[ p_{\theta}(x_{0:T})=p(x_T)\prod_{t=1}^{T}p_{\theta}(x_{t-1}|x_t)\\ p_{\theta}(x_{t-1}|x_t)=\mathcal{N}(x_{t-1};\mu_\theta(x_t,t),\Sigma_\theta(x_t,t)) \] Info 高斯概率密度函数： \[ f(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi \sigma^2}}exp(-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}) \] \(ax^2+bx=a(x+\frac{b}{2a})^2+C\) 若这是正态分布的指数项，对比可得： \(-1/2\sigma^2=a\) ， \(\mu=-b/2a\) C就是幅值相关的项了 \(q(x_t|x_{t-1})=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{a_t} x_{t-1},\beta_t I)\) \(q(x_t|x_0)=\mathcal{N}(x_t;\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0,1-\bar{a_t} I)\) 后验的扩散条件概率： \[ \begin{align} q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)&=\mathcal{N}(x_{t-1};\tilde \mu_\theta(x_t,x_0),\tilde \beta_t I)\\ 贝叶斯公式：q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)&=q(x_t|x_{t-1},x_0)\frac{q(x_{t-1},x_0)}{q(x_t,x_0)}\\ &=q(x_t|x_{t-1},x_0)\frac{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)\cancel{q(x_0)}}{q(x_t|x_0)\cancel{q(x_0)}}\\ 马尔可夫性:&=q(x_t|x_{t-1})\frac{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)}{q(x_t|x_0)}\\ &\propto exp(-\frac{1}{2}[ \dfrac{(x_t-\sqrt{a_t} x_{t-1})^2}{\beta_t} +\dfrac{(x_{t-1}-\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}} x_{0})^2}{1-\bar a_{t-1}} -\dfrac{(x_t-\sqrt{\bar a_t} x_{0})^2}{1-\bar a_t}] )\\ &= exp( \underbrace{-\frac{1}{2}(\dfrac{a_t}{\beta_t}+\dfrac{1}{1-\bar a_{t-1}})}_{a}x_{t-1}^2 +\underbrace{(\dfrac{\sqrt{a_t}}{\beta_t}x_t+\dfrac{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}{1-\bar a_t} x_{0})}_{b}x_{t-1}+C(x_0,x_t) )\\ 由上面的条件2可知：\quad 方差 \bar \beta_t &=-\frac{1}{2a}\\ &=\dfrac{1}{\dfrac{a_t}{\beta_t}+\dfrac{1}{1-\bar a_{t-1}}}\\ &=\dfrac{1-\bar a_{t-1}}{1-\bar a_t} \beta_t\\ 均值：\tilde \mu(x_t,x_0)&=-\frac{b}{2a}\\ &=\dfrac{(\dfrac{\sqrt{a_t}}{\beta_t}x_t+\dfrac{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}{1-\bar a_t}x_0)}{(\dfrac{a_t}{\beta_t}+\dfrac{1}{1-\bar a_{t-1}})}\\ &=\dfrac{\sqrt{ a_t}(1-\bar a_{t-1})}{1-\bar a_t} x_t +\dfrac{\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}}\beta_t}{1-\bar a_t} x_0 \end{align} \] 由之前计算的 \(x_t=\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z\) ，可以反推： \[ x_0=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}}(x_t-\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z_t) \] 代入均值表达式中： \[ \begin{align} \tilde \mu(x_t,x_0)&=\dfrac{\sqrt{a_t}(1-\bar a_{t-1})}{1-\bar a_t} x_t +\dfrac{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}}}\beta_t}{1-\bar a_t} \frac{1}{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}}}(x_t-\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}} z_t)\\ &=\boxed{\frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}}(\dfrac{a_t(1-\bar a_{t-1})}{1-\bar a_t} +\dfrac{\beta_t}{1-\bar a_t})x_t-\dfrac{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar a_{t-1}}}\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}}} \frac{1}{\boxed{\sqrt{\bar{a_t}}}} z_t\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}\cancel{(\dfrac{\cancel{a_t}-\bar a_{t}+1-\cancel{a_t}}{1-\bar a_t} )}x_t- \frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}\dfrac{\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}}} z_t\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{a_t}}(x_t-\dfrac{\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar{a_t}}}z_t) \end{align} \]
docs.title: 3.2 逆扩散过程

docs.text: 使用负对数似然： \(-\log p_\theta (x_0)\) , 为了让 \(p_\theta (x_0)\) 最大化，负对数似然需要最小化，由此，需要构造出一个置信上界，并最小化这个上界： \[ \begin{align} -\log p_\theta (x_0) &\leq -\log p_\theta (x_0)+ D_{KL}(q(x_{1:T}|x_0)\|p_\theta(x_{1:T}|x_0))\\ &= -\log p_\theta (x_0)+ \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{1:T}|x_0)}]\\ &=-\log p_\theta (x_0)+ \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})/p_\theta(x_{0})}]\\ &=-\log p_\theta (x_0)+ \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}+\underbrace{\log p_\theta(x_{0})}_{与q分布无关，可以放到期望外面}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]\\ 两边同时对q(x_0)取期望：-\mathbf{E}_{q(x_0)}\log p_\theta (x_0)&\leq \mathbf{E}_{q(x_0)} \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]\\ &= \mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]=L_{VLB} \end{align} \] Info 根据马尔可夫性和贝叶斯公式可以把 \(q(x_t|x_{t-1})\) 写成 \(x_{t-1}\) 的条件概率估计。 \[ \begin{align} q(x_t|x_{t-1})&=q(x_t|x_{t-1},x_0)=\dfrac{q(x_t,x_{t-1},x_0)}{q(x_{t-1},x_0)}\\ &=\dfrac{q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)q(x_t|x_0)q(x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)q(x_0)}\\ &=\dfrac{q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)q(x_t|x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)} \end{align} \] 化简 \(L_{VLB}\) ： \[ \begin{align} L_{VLB}&=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \frac{q(x_{1:T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{0:T})}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \frac{\prod_1^T q(x_t|x_{t-1})}{p_\theta(x_T)\prod_1^Tp_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)（逆过程）}]\\ 对数乘法变加法：&=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_1^T \log \frac{ q(x_t|x_{t-1})}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}]\\ 取出t=1的项： &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\frac{ q(x_t|x_{t-1})}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_0|x_1)}]\\ 应用上面提示的性质：&=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}\dfrac{q(x_t|x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}+\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{q(x_t|x_0)}{q(x_{t-1}|x_0)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}\\&+\log \dfrac{\cancel{q(x_{2}|x_0)}\cancel{q(x_{3}|x_0)}\dots q(x_{T}|x_0)}{q(x_{1}|x_0)\cancel{q(x_{2}|x_0)}\dots \cancel{q(x_{T-1}|x_0)}}+ \log \frac{ q(x_1|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[-\log p_\theta(x_T) +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}}\\ &+\log {q(x_{T}|x_0)} - \cancel{\log{q(x_{1}|x_0)} + \log{ q(x_1|x_0)}}-\log{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[\log \dfrac{q(x_{T}|x_0)}{p_\theta(x_T)} +\sum_2^T \log \boxed{\dfrac{ q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)}{p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)}} -\log{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[D_{KL}(q(x_{T}|x_0)\|p_\theta(x_T)) +\sum_2^TD_{KL}(q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)\|p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)) -\log{p_\theta(x_1|x_0)}]\\ &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[L_T+\sum_2^T L_{t-1}-L_0]\\ 由于q(x_0|x_1,x_0)=1，计算时L_0可以放入第二项中： &=\mathbf{E}_{q(x_{0:T})}[L_T+\sum_1^T L_{t-1}] \end{align} \] \(L_T\) 是不含参的，论文中又把 \(p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)\) 的方差设为了和 \(\beta\) 相关的常数，因此可训练的参数只存在于均值之中 由于 \(q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)\) 和 \(p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t)\) 的均值方差都知道，因此 \(L_{t-1}\) 的KL散度一定可求。 \[ \begin{align} L_{t-1}&=D_{KL}(q(x_{t-1}|x_t,x_0)\|p_\theta(x_{t-1}|x_t))\\ &=\frac{(\mu_1-\mu_2)^2}{2\sigma_2^2}+\underbrace{\frac{\sigma_1^2}{2\sigma_2^2}+log \frac{\sigma_2}{\sigma_1}-\frac{1}{2}}_{常数}\\ L_{t-1}-C&=\mathbf{E}_q [\frac{1}{2\sigma_2^2}(\tilde \mu_t-\mu_\theta)^2]\\ \mu_\theta(x_t,t)&=\tilde \mu(x_t,\frac{1}{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}(x_t-\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}\epsilon_\theta(x_t)))\\ &=\frac{1}{\sqrt{\bar a_t}}(x_t-\frac{\beta_t}{\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}}\epsilon_\theta(x_t))\\ \Rightarrow&\mathbf{E}_{x_o,\epsilon}[\dfrac{\beta_t^2}{2\sigma_t^2a_t(1-\bar a_t)}\|\epsilon -\epsilon_\theta(\sqrt{\bar a_t}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}\epsilon,t)\|]\\ L_{simple}(\theta) &\triangleq \mathbf{E}_{t,x_o,\epsilon}[\|\epsilon -\epsilon_\theta(\sqrt{\bar a_t}x_0+\sqrt{1-\bar a_t}\epsilon,t)\|]\\ \end{align} \]

docs.text: 网上看了一圈R2D2的讲解，也没有具体的实现，原论文也没有过多的介绍实现细节。看了一下 https://github.com/neka-nat/distributed_rl/ 对R2D2的实现，总结成笔记。 https://xlnwel.github.io/blog/reinforcement%20learning/R2D2/ https://xlnwel.github.io/blog/reinforcement%20learning/Apex-DQfQ/ 首先，总体框架同Apex一样，多个actor，一个learner，搭配parameter server。 不同点首先一个是网络，Apex实现的时候使用的是DQN,或dueling DQN， R2D2使用了 Dueling LSTM DQN，在CNN与全连接之间添加了一层LSTM cell（不是LSTM layer） dueling的实现，主要是一个优势函数： adv = F.relu(self.adv1(self.hx)) adv = self.adv2(adv) val = F.relu(self.val1(self.hx)) val = self.val2(val) 下面这个图是我画的一个buffer添加和更新的流程。 buffer type length what's inside Detail Step buffer deque n_step(3) Transiton(S,A,R,D) Once Full add the n-step return of first element to seq buffer recurrent_state_buffer list n_step(3) hidden state Once Full add the n-step return of first element to seq buffer Sequence buffer list n_burn_in + n_sequence Transiton(S,A,R,D) Once Full push all into local_memory,clear to overlap size Local memory ReplayMemory size(1000) Sequence(sequence_buffer,recurrent_state_buffer[0]) if size>_batch_size,sample batch_size push to PrioritizedMemory then clear memory PrioritizedMemory PrioritizedMemory 50000 Sequence(sequence_buffer,recurrent_state) prioritized_sample batch to learner Prioritized sample: Based on SumTree: SumTree 根据权重的大小来影响抽样的概率: Original Prioritized Experience Replay \[ \begin{align*} \text{TD error: }&δ_i=r_t+γQ_{θ^−}(s_t+1,argmax_{a∈A}Q_θ(s_t+1,a))−Q_θ(s_t,a_t)\\ &p_i=|δ_i|+ϵ\\ &P(i)=\sum_{k}{\frac{p^α_i}{p^α_k}} \end{align*} \] DQfD version: \[ \begin{align} \mathcal T_h(Q)(x,a)&:=\mathbb E_{x'\sim P(\cdot|x,a)}\left[h\left(R(x,a)+\gamma\max_{a'\in\mathcal A}h^{-1}(Q(x',a'))\right)\right]\\ where\quad h(z)&=\text{sign}(z)(\sqrt{|z|+1}-1)+\epsilon z,\quad \epsilon=10^{-2} \\ &p=\eta\max_i\delta_i+(1-\eta)\bar\delta \end{align} \] def rescale ( x , eps = 1.0e-3 ): return x . sign () * (( x . abs () + 1.0 ) . sqrt () - docs.text: 使用服务器端tensorboard时，可以将服务器端口映射到本地端口: ssh -L 6006:localhost:6006 user@server address 在使用多个GPU的server时, 尤其是使用分布式算法训练时，一张GPU内存可能无法吃下所有的agent，先获取GPU内存情况再手动实现最优GPU（空闲内存最大）的分配, 对于动态内存的情况（如初始化时内存较低，交互时内存上升）可以设置一个估计值每次分配后减去该定值后再判断最优GPU: def get_gpu_mem (): os . system ( 'nvidia-smi -q -d Memory |grep -A4 GPU|grep Free >tmpgpufreemem' ) memory_available = [ int ( x . split ()[ 2 ]) for x in open ( 'tmpgpufreemem' , 'r' ) . readlines ()] return np . array ( memory_available ) class Gpu_scheduler (): def __init__ ( self ): self . mem = get_gpu_mem () def __call__ ( self , * args , ** kwargs ): if np . all ( self . mem < 1500 ): raise Exception ( f "Not Enough GPU memory left, current memory: { self . mem } " ) else : current_freer = np . argmax ( self . mem ) self . mem [ current_freer ] -= 1500 print ( f 'Using Gpu: { current_freer } ' ) return current_freer DQN训练时loss不收敛且发散，很可能是target发散，建议减少target的更新频率，通常取2000:1, 1000:1, 500:1

参考： https://www.cs.jhu.edu/~paxia/notes/rl_notes.html Value Function \(V_π(s)=E[R(s_0)+γR(s_1)+γ^2R(s_2)...|s_0=s,π]\) Bellman equation: \(V_\pi(s)=R(s)+\gamma\sum_{s'\in S}P_{s\pi(a)}(s')V_\pi(s')\) 基础知识 ¶ 马尔可夫决策过程 ¶ 马尔可夫决策过程可以表示成一个tuple: \[ (S,A,P_{sa},\gamma,R) \] S为set of states，A is a set of actions, Psa are transition probabilities, γ is a discount factor and R:S×A→R is the reward function. 目标 ¶ 目标是最大化 the expected reward： \(E[R(s0)+γR(s1)+γ^2R(s2)...]\) 策略 Policy ¶ 策略是一个函数 π:S→A, 即由某一状态导出动作： \(ai=π(si)\) . 一个策略可以对应一个价值函数 Value Function： \[ V^π(s)=E[R(s0)+γR(s1)+γ^2R(s2)...|s0,π] \] 对于一个特定策略，其价值函数应该满足贝尔曼方程Bellman equation： \[ V^π(s)=R(s)+γ\sum_{s'∈S}P_{sπ}(s)(s')V^π(s') \] 即由转移概率可以到达的所有状态的价值的加权平均。R(s) is the immediate reward。 每个状态对应的最优策略： \(V^∗(s)=max_πV^π(s)\) ，对应的最优价值函数： \[ V^∗(s)=R(s)+\max_aγ \sum_{s'∈S}P_{sa}(s')V^∗(s'). \] Solving finite-state MDPs ¶ Value Iteration \(V(s)=R(s)+max_aγ∑_{s'∈S}P_{sa}(s')V(s')\) Policy Iteration π(s)=argmaxa∑s'Psa(s')V(s')\pi(s) = \arg\max_a \sum_{s'} P_sa(s')V(s') 蒙特卡洛方法和TD方法区别：因为蒙特卡洛方法进行完整的采样来获取了长期的回报值，因而在价值估计上会有着更小的偏差，但是也正因为收集了完整的信息 所以价值的方差会更大「毕竟基于试验的采样得到 和真实的分布还是有差距 不充足的交互导致的较大方差」；而TD算法与其相反 因为只考虑了前一步的回报值 其他都是基于之前的估计值 因而估计具有偏差 但方差也较小； TD ¶ MC TD(1) or \(\infty\) -step TD unbiased Markov/non Markov TD TD(0) or 1-step TD biased Markov environment TD( \(\lambda\) ) \(G_{t}^\lambda = (1-\lambda)\sum_{n=1}^{T-t-1} \lambda^{n-1}G_{t:t+n}+\lambda^{T-t-n}G_t\) Simplified Bellman Equation: \(Q_\pi(s_t,a_t)=E(R(s)+\gamma Q_\pi(s_{t+1},a_{t+1}))\) Temperal Difference: V(s)←V(s)+α(Y−V(s)) SARSA On-policy \(Q_π(s_t,a_t)←Q_π(s_t,a_t)+α[r_t+γQ_π(s_{t+1},a_{t+1})−Q_π(s_t,a_t)]\) , \(a_{t+1}=π(s_{t+1})\) Q-Learning Off-policy \(Q(s_t,a_t)←Q(s_t,a_t)+α[r_t+γmax_{a_{t+1}}(Q(s_{t+1},a_{t+1})−Q(s_t,a_t))]\) Function approximation ¶ 状态空间太大的时候，用函数逼近 Incremental methods ¶ 定义损失函数： \(J(w) = E_{\pi}[(V^{\pi}(s) - \hat{V}(s, w))^2]\) GD/SGD to update: \( \(\delta w = - rac{1}{2}

The main downside is that **a ground-truth model of the environment is usually not available to the agent. Policy Optimization :They optimize the parameters either directly by gradient ascent on the performance objective , or indirectly, by maximizing local approximations of . This optimization is almost always performed on-policy , which means that each update only uses data collected while acting according to the most recent version of the policy. docs.text: Bellman期望方程 ¶ policy iteration is faster than value iteration , as a policy converges more quickly than a value function Q learning 过估计问题？ ¶ \[ Q(s,a)=\mathbb{E}_{\pi,p(s',r|s,a)}[\sum_0^\infty \gamma^k r_{t+k+1}|s_t=s,a_t=a] \] 探索不足：探索不足导致产生的样本无法反应出公式中的概率分布 \(\pi,p(s',r|s,a)\) 值函数存在方差： \(Q(s,a)\) 的更新存在方差，不可能一步就更新到目标值，它实际的形式应该是围绕目标值上下波动，但是波动的幅度越来越小 贪心思想将高估的值进行了传递：训练过程中，1与2共同作用导致实际的 \(Q(s',a')\) 其实是一个估计值，它和最优的 \(Q^*(s',a')\) 存在误差，存在一些动作对应的值被高估，而贪心思想又在更新 \(Q(s,a)\) 时使用了下一个状态 \(s'\) 中最大的 \(\max _{a'}Q(s',a')\) ，恰好会使得那些被高估的动作的值在更新时不断被反向传递回之前的状态 why deterministic? ¶ Stochastic policy gradient: $$ ∇θJ(πθ)=∫Sρπ(s)∫A∇θπθ(a|s)Qπ(s,a)dads=Es∼ρπ,a∼πθ[∇θlogπθ(a|s)Qπ(s,a)]∇θJ(πθ)=∫Sρπ(s)∫A∇θπθ(a|s)Qπ(s,a)dads=Es∼ρπ,a∼πθ[∇θlog⁡πθ(a|s)Qπ(s,a)] $$ Deterministic policy gradient: $$ ∇θJ(μθ)=∫Sρμ(s)∇θμθ(s)∇aQμ(s,a)|a=μθ(s)ds=Es∼ρμ[∇θμθ(s)∇aQμ(s,a)|a=μθ(s)]∇θJ(μθ)=∫Sρμ(s)∇θμθ(s)∇aQμ(s,a)|a=μθ(s)ds=Es∼ρμ[∇θμθ(s)∇aQμ(s,a)|a=μθ(s)] $$ Notice that the expectation in the deterministic policy gradient isn't over the action space. Target Net 作用 ¶ 旨在提高训练稳定性，因为神经网络是脱胎于监督学习理论的，监督学习前提就是样本独立同分布，刚开始样本是(x=1,y=2)，更新过一次参数后，变成了(x=1,y=−1)，这咋拟合？y要是满足一个正态分布还好说，y要是一个乱七八糟的分布，和参数还强相关，那就有可能会引起训练结果不收敛。用同一个网络既做预测，又做监督，会造成moving target，“This “moving target” can destabilize training because it makes it much less clear what values a network should be trying to approach”。就是样本分布变化可能会引起神经网络的训练的不稳定。 policy-based 和value-based的区别 On-Policy 和 OFF-Policy ¶ Q-learning是off-policy的方法，为什么不使用重要性采样？ ¶ Experience replay 的作用 ¶ 让“有用”的样本得到更多的训练次数，提高样本的使用效率。样本被存入Memory，有可能在几次采样中都被捞出来训练，这样“好的”样本训练次数增加了，可以加速收敛。 打破连续采样的样本之间的“correlations”，可以减少训练时的方差。由于reinforcement learning的采样方式，样本间存在很强的关联关系。因为毕竟是MDP模型，前后间的关系必然是紧密的，但我们的模型是神经网络，要求样本之间是独立同分布，不符合这个前提的数据集训练起来方差很大，收敛比较困难。 由于on-policy的学习模式使然(严格来说DQN是 off-policy，这里大致上是一样的)，模型的参数会决定下一时刻的样本分布，这样会让模型陷入比较糟糕的局部最优，使用Experience replay可以减轻这种效应。具体来说，采样分布 μ 是策略的函数，当策略定的时候，采样分布也确定了，如果是on-policy模式，策略一直在迭代更新，那么 μ 也一直在变，也就是样本的分布一直在变。 Deadly triad ¶ Function Approximation 函数近似。 Bootstrapping 自举法。使用动态规划或者TD方法，而不是使用完整轨迹的reward。 Off-policy training 离策略的训练方式。训练用的采样分布不是由目标策略产生的，而且一直在变化。 同时使用以上三种方法可能会导致不收敛。

This may cause the policy to get trapped in local optima. Advantage Function: A=V-R from spinningup . 2.2 TRPO ¶ Let denote a policy with parameters . The theoretical TRPO update is: where is the surrogate advantage , a measure of how policy performs relative to the old policy using data from the old policy: and is an average KL-divergence between policies across states visited by the old policy: We Taylor expand the objective and constraint to leading order around : resulting in an approximate optimization problem, This approximate problem can be analytically solved by the methods of Lagrangian duality [x]]( https://spinningup.openai.com/en/latest/algorithms/trpo.html#id2 ), yielding the solution: If we were to stop here, and just use this final result, the algorithm would be exactly calculating the Natural Policy Gradient . TRPO adds a modification to this update rule: a backtracking line search, 2.3 PPO(clipped) ¶ typically taking multiple steps of (usually minibatch) SGD to maximize the objective. Here is given by simpler version: where: the new policy does not benefit by going far away from the old policy 2.4 DDPG ¶ 2.4.1 The Q-Learning Side of DDPG ¶ polyak averaging: DDPG deals with computing the maximum over actions in the target in continuous action spaces by using a target policy network to compute an action which approximately maximizes . where is the target policy. 2.4.2 The Policy Learning Side of DDPG ¶ We want to learn a deterministic policy which gives the action that maximizes . perform gradient ascent (with respect to policy parameters only) to solve: Note that the Q-function parameters are treated as constants here. DDPG trains a deterministic policy in an off-policy way. Because the policy is deterministic, if the agent were to explore on-policy, in the beginning it would probably not try a wide enough variety of actions to find useful learning signals. To make DDPG policies explore better, we add noise to their actions at training time. 2.5 TD3 ¶ A common failure mode for DDPG is that the learned Q-function begins to dramatically overestimate Q-values, which then leads to the policy breaking, because it exploits the errors in the Q-function. Trick One: Clipped Double-Q Learning. TD3 learns two Q-functions instead of one (hence “twin”), and uses the smaller of the two Q-values to form the targets in the Bellman error loss functions. Trick Two: “Delayed” Policy Updates. TD3 updates the policy (and target networks) less frequently than the Q-function. The paper recommends one policy update for every two Q-function updates. Trick Three: Target Policy Smoothing. TD3 adds noise to the target action, to make it harder for the policy to exploit Q-function errors by smoothing out Q along changes in action. target policy smoothing . Actions used to form the Q-learning target are based on the target policy, , but with clipped noise added on each dimension of the action. After adding the clipped noise, the target action is then clipped to lie in the valid action range (all valid actions, , satisfy ). The target actions are thus: clipped double-Q learning . Both Q-functions use a single target, calculated using whichever of the two Q-functions gives a smaller target value: and then both are learned by regressing to this target: Using the smaller Q-value for the target, and regressing towards that, helps fend off overestimation in the Q-function. Lastly: the policy is learned just by maximizing : 2.6 SAC ¶ A central feature of SAC is entropy regularization. The policy is trained to maximize a trade-off between expected return and entropy , a measure of randomness in the policy. Entropy-Regularized Reinforcement Learning Let be a random variable with probability mass or density function . The policy should, in each state, act to maximize the expected future return plus expected future entropy. That is, it should maximize , which we expand out into The way we optimize the policy makes use of the reparameterization trick , in which a sample from is drawn by computing a deterministic function of state, policy parameters, and independent noise. To illustrate: following the authors of the SAC paper, we use a squashed Gaussian policy, which means that samples are obtained according to The reparameterization trick allows us to rewrite the expectation over actions (which contains a pain point: the distribution depends on the policy parameters) into an expectation over noise (which removes the pain point: the distribution now has no dependence on parameters): To get the policy loss, the final step is that we need to substitute with one of our function approximators. Ceres 使用入门 ¶ 1.1 1. 问题定义 ¶ \[ \begin{align} \min_x \frac{1}{2}\sum_i &\rho_i (\|f_i(x_{i1},\dots,x_{ik})\|) \\\\ \text{s.t. } l_i&\leq x_j\leq u_i \end{align} \] 1.2 2. 定义Costfunction ¶ Given[x1,x2,...,xk] , CostFunction is responsible for computing the vector f(x1,x2,...,xk) and the Jacobian matrices: $$ J_i=D_if(x_1,...,x_k) $$ \[ J=\begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial f_{1}}{\partial x_1}&\dots&\frac{\partial f_{1}}{\partial x_c} \\\\ \vdots&\vdots&\vdots \\\\ \frac{\partial f_{r}}{\partial x_1}&\dots&\frac{\partial f_{r}}{\partial x_c} \end{bmatrix}_{num\_residuals \times parameter\_block\_sizes\_[i]} \] \[ \text{jacobians}[i][r * parameter\_block\_sizes\_[i] + c] =\frac{\partial \text{ residual[r]}}{\partial \text{ parameters}[i][c]} \] 1.2.1 2.1 自动求导 ¶ 自动求导 // 定义自动求导的残差伪函数 template < typename _T1 > struct MyCostFunctor { //定义变量 MyCostFunctor ( var1 , var2 ...) : var1_ ( var1 ), var2_ ( var2 ),... {} template < typename _T2 > //重载括号并定义残差 bool operator () ( //输入：待优化的参数 const _T2 * const param1 , const _T2 * const param2 ,..., //输入：残差 _T2 * residuals ) const { residuals = f ( param1 , param2 ...); return true ; } //用工厂函数创建Costfunction static ceres :: CostFunction * Create ( const vars ) { return ( new AutoDiffCostFunction < MyCostFunctor , n_res , n_param1 , n_param2 ,... > ( new MyCostFunctor ( var1 , var2 ...)) ^ ^ ^ | | | Dimension of residual ------+ | | Dimension of param1 ----------------+ | Dimension of param2 ------------------------+ } } 工厂模式函数构造costfunction ceres :: CostFunction * cost_function = MyCostFunctor < _T >:: Create ( var1 , var2 ...); 1.2.2 2.2 解析求导 ¶ 解析求导模板 class AnalyticCostFunction : public ceres :: SizedCostFunction < n_res , n_param1 , n_param2 ,... > { public : AnalyticCostFunction ( var1 , var2 ,...) : var1_ ( var1 ), var2_ ( var2 ), ... {} virtual bool Evaluate ( double const * const * parameters , double * residuals , double ** jacobians ) const { //变量 var1 = parameters [ 0 ]; var2 = parameters [ 1 ]; ... //计算残差 residuals = f ( var1 , var2 ,...); //计算雅可比 jacobians = j ( var1 , var2 ,...); return true ; } //储存变量 protected : var1 , var2 ,...; }; parameters 是 CostFunction::parameter_block_sizes_.size() 大小的array. parameters[i] 是 parameter_block_sizes_[i] 大小的包含第i个parameter block需要参数的array. parameters is never nullptr . residuals is an array of size num_residuals_ . residuals is never nullptr . jacobians is an array of arrays of size CostFunction::parameter_block_sizes_.size() . If jacobians is nullptr , the user is only expected to compute the residuals. jacobians[i] is a row-major array of size num_residuals x parameter_block_sizes_[i] If jacobians[i] is not nullptr , the user is required to compute the Jacobian of the residual vector with respect to parameters[i] and store it in this array If jacobians[i] is nullptr , then this computation can be skipped. docs.text: Given[x1,x2,...,xk] , CostFunction is responsible for computing the vector f(x1,x2,...,xk) and the Jacobian matrices: $$ J_i=D_if(x_1,...,x_k) $$ \[ J=\begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial f_{1}}{\partial x_1}&\dots&\frac{\partial f_{1}}{\partial x_c} \\\\ \vdots&\vdots&\vdots \\\\ \frac{\partial f_{r}}{\partial x_1}&\dots&\frac{\partial f_{r}}{\partial x_c} \end{bmatrix}_{num\_residuals \times parameter\_block\_sizes\_[i]} \] \[ \text{jacobians}[i][r * parameter\_block\_sizes\_[i] + c] =\frac{\partial \text{ residual[r]}}{\partial \text{ parameters}[i][c]} \]

ESKF 简介 ¶ 原状态变量称为 名义状态变量 （nominal state）即不考虑噪声的状态。 真实的状态为 真值状态 (true state), 需要考虑噪声。 ESKF里的状态变量称为 误差状态变量 （error state), 他们的关系为 误差状态变量= 真值状态-名义状态变量 , 误差状态变量 ESKF predicts a Gaussian estimate of the error-state ESKF 优点 ： error state中旋转变量可以用最小表示，即旋转向量表示，没有多余的变量，可以避免冗余变量带来的singularity risk error-state system 通常都在原点附近，可以避免万向节锁，奇异值等问题，保证linearization每时每刻都是可行的 error state 通常都很小，因此二阶量可以忽略，雅可比的计算更快速 error state dynamics比较慢，因为大信号在名义动力学中被积分了，剩下的error是小信号，因此ESKF可以工作在较低的频率下 ESKF流程： In parallel with integration of the nominal state, the ESKF predicts a Gaussian estimate of the error-state. It only predicts, because by now no other measurement is available to correct these estimates. The filter correction is performed at the arrival of information other than IMU (e.g. GPS, vision, etc.), which is able to render the errors observable and which happens generally at a much lower rate than the integration phase. This correction provides a posterior Gaussian estimate of the error-state. After this, the error-state’s mean is injected into the nominal-state, then reset to zero. The error-state’s covariances matrix is conveniently updated to reflect this reset. The system goes on like this forever 2. 2. 真值状态动力学方程 ¶ 真值状态动力学方程 ，这些状态是在世界坐标系下的。 \[ \begin{align} &\text{Position:}&\dot{p_t}&=v_t\\ &\text{Velocity:}&\dot{v_t}&=a_t=R_t(a_m-bias_{at}-\eta_a)+g_t\\ &\text{Quaternion:}&\dot{q_t}&=\frac{1}{2}q_t \otimes \omega_t=\frac{1}{2}q_t \otimes (\omega_m-bias_{gt}-\eta_g )\\ &\text{Accelerometer bias:}&\dot{bias}_{at}&=\eta_{ba}(noise)\\ &\text{Gyrometer bias:}&\dot{bias}_{gt}&=\eta_{bg}(noise)\\ &\text{Gravity vector:}&\dot{g_t}&=0\\ \end{align} \] 其中，加速度at和角速度wt是由IMU测量值计算出来的： \[ \begin{align} a_m&=R_t^\top(a_t-g_t)+bias_a+\eta_a &\Rightarrow a_t&=R_t(a_m-bias_a-\eta_a)+g_t\\ \omega_m&=\omega_t+bias_g+\eta_g&\Rightarrow \omega_t&=\omega_m-bias_g-\eta_g \end{align} \] 3. 3.名义状态动力学方程 ¶ 名义状态动力学方程 ，这些状态是在世界坐标系下的。 \[ \begin{align} &\text{Position:}&\dot{p}&=v\\ &\text{Velocity:}&\dot{v}&=R(a_m-bias_a)+g\\ &\text{Quaternion:}&\dot{q}&=\frac{1}{2}q \otimes (\omega_m-bias_g)\\ &\text{Accelerometer bias:}&\dot{bias}_{a}&=0\\ &\text{Gyrometer bias:}&\dot{bias}_{g}&=0\\ &\text{Gravity vector:}&\dot{g_t}&=0\\ \end{align} \] 4. 4.误差状态动力学方程 ¶ 误差状态动力学方程 (error-state kinematics) \[ \begin{align} &\text{Position:}& \delta \dot{p}&=\delta v\\ &\text{Velocity:}& \delta \dot{v}&=-R[a_m-bias_a]_{times}\delta \theta -R \delta a_b +\delta g -R\eta_a\\ &\text{Quaternion:}& \delta \dot{\theta}&=-[\omega_m-bias_g]_{\times}\delta \theta - \delta bias_g - \eta_g\\ &\text{Accelerometer bias:}& \delta \dot{bias}_{a}&=\eta_{ba}\\ &\text{Gyrometer bias:}& \delta \dot{bias}_{g}&=\eta_{bg}\\ &\text{Gravity vector:}& \delta \dot{g}&=0\\ \end{align} \] 4.1 速度误差(Linear velocity error) 动力学推导: ¶ \[ \begin{align} R_t& = R(I+[\delta \theta]_{\times})\\ bias_{at}&=bias_a+\delta bias_a\\ g_{t}&=g+\delta g\\ a_B& \doteq a_m-bias_a\\ \delta a_B&\doteq -\delta bias_a-\eta_{ba}\\ \Rightarrow \dot{v}&=R a_B +g\\ \dot{v}+\dot{\delta v}=\dot{v_t}&=R_t(a_m-bias_{at}-\eta_a)+g_t\\ &=R(I+[\delta \theta]_{\times})(\underbrace{a_m-bias_a}_{a_B}+\underbrace{-\delta bias_a-\eta_a}_{\delta a_B})+g_t\\ &=R(I+[\delta \theta]_{\times})(a_B+\delta a_B)+g+\delta g\\ \Rightarrow \cancel{R a_B} +\cancel{g} +\dot{\delta v}=\dot{v_t}&=\cancel{R a_B}+R[\delta \theta]_{\times}a_B+R\delta a_B+R[\delta \theta]_{\times}\delta a_B+\cancel{g}+\delta g\\ \Rightarrow \dot{\delta v}&=R[\delta \theta]_{\times}a_B+R\delta a_B+\cancel{R[\delta \theta]_{\times}\delta a_B}(二阶小量)+\delta g\\ &=-R[a_B]_{\times}\delta \theta+R\delta a_B+\delta g\\ &=-R[a_m-bias_a]_{\times}\delta \theta+R(-\delta bias_a-\eta_{ba})+\delta g\\ \dot{\delta v}&=-R[a_m-bias_a]_{\times}\delta \theta-R\delta bias_a+\delta g-R\eta_{ba}\\ \end{align} \] 如果三轴加速度计是同型号的，可以假设其加速度计噪声是独立同分布且各项同性的，即其噪声的均值和协方差与旋转无关。 即 \(\eta_{ba}=R \eta_{ba}\) ，则可以进一步简化： \[ \dot{\delta v}=-R[a_m-bias_a]_{\times}\delta \theta-R\delta bias_a+\delta g-\underline{\eta_{ba}}\\ \] 4.2 方向误差(orientation error) 动力学推导: ¶ \[ \begin{align} (定义)q_t&=q \otimes \delta q\\ \dot{q_t}&=\frac{1}{2}q_t \otimes \omega_t\\ \dot{q}&=\frac{1}{2}q \otimes \omega\\ bias_{gt}&=bias_g+\delta bias_g\\ (定义)\omega_t &= \omega + \delta \omega \\ (计算)\omega_t &=\omega_m-bias_{gt}-\eta_g \\ &=\underbrace{\omega_m-bias_g}_{\omega}+\underbrace{-\delta bias_g-\eta_g}_{\delta\omega}\\ \frac{1}{2}q_t \otimes \omega_t=\dot{q_t}&=(\dot{q \otimes \delta q})\\ \Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}q \otimes \delta q \otimes \omega_t=\dot{q_t}&=\dot{q} \otimes \delta q+q \otimes \dot{\delta q}\\ \Rightarrow\frac{1}{2} \cancel{q \otimes} \delta q \otimes \omega_t&=\frac{1}{2} \cancel{q \otimes} \omega \otimes \delta q+\cancel{q \otimes} \dot{\delta q}\\ \Rightarrow 2\dot{\delta q} &=\delta q \otimes \omega_t-\omega \otimes \delta q \end{align} \] 四元数乘法 \([\mathbf{p}]_L=p_w\mathbf{I}+\begin{bmatrix}0&-\mathbf{p}_v^\top\\\mathbf{p}_v&[\mathbf{p}_v]_{\times}\end{bmatrix}\) , \([\mathbf{q}]_R=q_w\mathbf{I}+\begin{bmatrix}0&-\mathbf{q}_v^\top\\\mathbf{q}_v&-[\mathbf{q}_v]_{\times}\end{bmatrix}\) 将向量(纯虚四元数)的四元数乘法带入打开: \[ \begin{align} \Rightarrow 2\dot{\delta q} &=[\omega_t]_{R}\delta q -[\omega]_L\delta q\\ &=\begin{bmatrix} 0&-\omega_t^\top\\ \omega_t&-[\omega_t]_{\times} \end{bmatrix}\delta q - \begin{bmatrix} 0&-\omega^\top\\ \omega & [\omega]_{\times} \end{bmatrix}\delta q\\ &=\begin{bmatrix} 0&-(\omega_t-\omega)^\top\\ \omega_t-\omega&-[\omega_t+\omega]_{\times} \end{bmatrix}\begin{bmatrix}1 \\ \frac{1}{2}\delta\theta\end{bmatrix}\\ \Rightarrow 2\begin{bmatrix}0 \\ \frac{1}{2}\delta\dot{\theta}\end{bmatrix}&=\begin{bmatrix} 0&-\delta\omega^\top\\ \delta\omega &-[\delta\omega+2\omega]_{\times} \end{bmatrix}\begin{bmatrix}1 \\ \frac{1}{2}\delta\theta\end{bmatrix}\\ \Rightarrow & \begin{cases} 0 = -\delta\omega^\top \delta\theta(二阶小量忽略)\\ \delta\dot{\theta} = \delta\omega -[\delta\omega+2\omega]_{\times}\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{cases}\\ \Rightarrow \delta\dot{\theta} &= \delta\omega \cancel{-\frac{1}{2}[\delta\omega]_{\times}\delta\theta} -[\omega]_{\times}\delta\theta\\ \Rightarrow \delta\dot{\theta} &= \delta\omega-[\omega]_{\times}\delta\theta\\ &=-[\omega_m-bias_g]_{\times}\delta\theta-\delta bias_g-\eta_g\\ \end{align} \]

docs.text: 1. 5.离散状态动力学方程 ¶ 连续动力学方程积分可得离散的动力学方程，有两部分： 1. 名义状态的积分 2. 误差变量的积分 数值积分方法:龙格库塔法(Runge-Kutta) 需要解决的问题为连续状态方程到离散状态方城的转化： \[ x(t+\Delta t)=x(t)+\int_t^{t+\Delta t} f(\tau,x(\tau)) d\tau \] 1. 欧拉法(The Euler method) ¶ 欧拉法假设函数导数f()在两个时刻之间不变: \[ x_{n+1}=x_n+\Delta t \cdot f(t_n,x_n) \] 可以看作是1步的龙格库塔法： \[ \begin{align} k_1&=f(t_n,x_n)\\ x_{n+1}&=x_n+\Delta t \cdot k_1 \end{align} \] 2. 中值法(The midpoint method) ¶ 欧拉法假设函数导数f()取在两个时刻中点处的值: \[ x_{n+1}=x_n+\Delta t \cdot f(t_n+\frac{1}{2}\Delta t,x_n+\frac{1}{2}\Delta t \cdot f(t_n,x_n)) \] 可以看作是2步的龙格库塔法： \[ \begin{align} k_1&=f(t_n,x_n)\\ x(t_n+\frac{1}{2}\Delta t)&=x_n+\frac{1}{2}\Delta t \cdot k_1\\ k_2=f(t_n+&\frac{1}{2}\Delta t, x(t_n+\frac{1}{2}\Delta t))\\ x_{n+1}&=x_n+\Delta t \cdot k_2\\ \end{align} \] 3. RK4 method ¶ \[ \begin{align} x_{n+1}&=x_n+\frac{\Delta t}{6}(k_1+2k_2+2k_3+k_4)\\ k_1&=f(t_n,x_n)\\ k_2&=f(t_n+\frac{\Delta t}{2}, x_n+\frac{\Delta t}{2} \cdot k_1)\\ k_3&=f(t_n+\frac{\Delta t}{2}, x_n+\frac{\Delta t}{2} \cdot k_2)\\ k_4&=f(t_n+\Delta t, x_n+\Delta t \cdot k_3)\\ \end{align} \] 闭式积分求解法(Closed-form integration methods) 考虑一阶线性微分方程: \(\dot{x}(t)=A \cdot x(t)\) ， 其解为： \[ x_{n+1}=e^{A\Delta t}x_n=\Phi x_n \] \(\Phi\) 称为转化矩阵(Transition matrix),可以用泰勒级数展开： \[ \Phi=e^{A\Delta t}=I+A\Delta t + \frac{1}{2}A^2 \Delta t^2+\dots=\sum_0^\infty\frac{1}{k!}A^k\Delta t^k \] 1.角度误差(the angular error)的积分 ¶ 将噪声项舍去,并积分: \[ \begin{align} \dot{\delta \theta}&=-[\omega]_{\times}\delta \theta \\ （积分）\Rightarrow \Phi &= e^{-[\omega]_{\times} \Delta t}\\ &=I-[u]_{\times} sin \Delta \theta + [u]_{\times}^2(1-cos\Delta\theta)\\ &\triangleq R\{-\mathbf{u} \Delta \theta\}=R\{\mathbf{\omega} \Delta t\}^\top \end{align} \] 其中 \(\mathbf{\omega} \Delta t \triangleq \mathbf{u} \Delta \theta\) ， \(\mathbf{u}\) 为单位向量(旋转轴)， \(\Delta \theta\) 为转角。最后的结果是一个旋转向量 \(R\{\mathbf{\omega} \Delta t\}^\top\) 。 1.1 名义状态离散动力学方程 (nominal state kinematics) ¶ \[ \begin{align} p & \leftarrow p +\delta v \Delta t + \frac{1}{2}[R(a_m-a_b)+g]\Delta t^2\\ v &\leftarrow v+[R(a_m-a_b)+g]\Delta t\\ q&\leftarrow q \otimes quaternion\{(\omega_m-\omega_b)\Delta t\}\\ bias_{a}&\leftarrow bias_{a} \\ bias_{g}&\leftarrow bias_{g}\\ g &\leftarrow g\\ \end{align} \] 1.2 误差状态离散动力学方程 (error-state kinematics) ¶ \[ \begin{align} \delta p& \leftarrow \delta p +\delta v \Delta t\\ \delta v&\leftarrow \delta v+(-R[a_m-bias_a]_{times}\delta \theta -R \delta a_b +\delta g)\Delta t + v_i\\ \delta \theta&\leftarrow R\{(\omega_m-bias_g) \Delta t\}^\top \delta \theta - \delta bias_g\Delta t + \theta_i\\ \delta bias_{a}&\leftarrow \delta bias_{a} +a_i\\ \delta bias_{g}&\leftarrow \delta bias_{g} + \omega_i\\ \delta g &\leftarrow \delta g\\ \end{align} \] \([v_i,\theta_i,a_i,\omega_i]\) 是随机脉冲扰动(random impulses)积分所得，由高斯过程描述。均值为0,方差由协方差积分而来。 随机噪声和扰动的积分 考虑一个连续系统 \(\dot x = f (x, u, w)\) , 测量值 \(u_m = u+ \eta_u\) , 离散化时，所有控制量都在 \(n\Delta t\) 时刻被采样，即: \(u_{m,n}=u_m(n \Delta t) = u(n \Delta t) + \tilde{u}(n \Delta t)\) ,显然这一部分测量值在积分区间是恒定的，因此作用在u上的噪声水平也是恒定的，所以积分后方差不变。w为随机扰动，从未被采样。因此积分时，这几种噪声的结果也是不同的。 \[ \begin{align} 线性化: \dot{\delta x} &= A \delta x + B \tilde u + C w^c\\ \delta x_{n+1} &=\underbrace{\delta x + \int A \delta x}_1 + \underbrace{\int B \tilde u}_2 +\underbrace{\int C w^c}_3\\ A&=\left .\frac{d f }{d \delta x} \right |_{x,u_m}\\ B&=\left .\frac{d f }{d \tilde u} \right |_{x,u_m}\\ C&=\left .\frac{d f }{d w} \right |_{x,u_m}\\ \end{align} \] 其中有三部分: \(\delta x + \int A \delta x=\Phi \delta x\) ，为动力学方程的积分上面已经证明过了 \(\int B \tilde u=B \Delta t \tilde u\) ， 是由于u一旦采样，他的性质就被确定了，因此按照常数求解 \(w^n \triangleq \int_{n \Delta t}^{(n+1) \Delta t} \omega(\tau)d \tau \sim (0, W \Delta t)\) ， 随机过程的积分 由此，ESKF 的预测过程会迭代误差状态的平均值(mean)和协方差(covariance): \[ \begin{align} \hat{\delta x_{n+1}} & = F_x \hat{\delta x_{n}}+F_u \tilde{u}_n + F_w w_n\\ 期望：\hat{\delta x_{n+1}} & = F_x \hat{\delta x_{n}}\\ 方差：P&=F_x P_n F_x^\top + F_u U F_u^\top +F_w W F_w^\top\\ &=e^{A\Delta t}P_n (e^{A\Delta t})^\top + \Delta t^2 B U^c B^\top + \Delta t C W^c C^\top \end{align} \] 将误差动力学系统重新写成状态方程的形式： 状态: \(x=\begin{bmatrix} p\\ v\\ q\\ bias_a\\ bias_g\\ g \end{bmatrix}\) 一阶导数: \(\delta x=\begin{bmatrix} \delta p\\ \delta v\\ \delta \theta\\ \delta bias_a\\ \delta bias_g\\ \delta g \end{bmatrix}\) 输入（测量值）: \(u_m=\begin{bmatrix} a_m\\ \omega_m\\ \end{bmatrix}\) 噪声: \(i=\begin{bmatrix} v_i\\ \theta_i\\ a_i\\ \omega_i \end{bmatrix}\) 得到: \[ \delta x \leftarrow F_x(x,u_m)\cdot \delta x+F_i \cdot i \]

docs.text: 1. ESKF 预测方程 ¶ \[ \begin{align} \delta \hat{x} &\leftarrow F_x(x,u_m) \cdot \delta \hat{x}\\ P &\leftarrow F_x P F_x^\top +F_i Q_i F_i^\top\\ \end{align} \] 因此 \(\delta x\) 满足分布： \(\delta x \sim \mathcal N(\hat{\delta x} ,P)\) 其中Fx和 Fi 是f()相对于误差和误差扰动的雅可比: \[ \begin{align} F_x &= \frac{\partial f}{\partial \delta x} = \begin{bmatrix} I & I \Delta t & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0\\ 0 & I & -R[a_m-bias_a]_{times}\Delta t & -R\Delta t & 0 & I \Delta t\\ 0 & 0 & R\{(\omega_m-bias_g) \Delta t\}^\top & 0 & -I\Delta t & 0\\ 0& 0& 0& I& 0& 0\\ 0& 0& 0& 0& I& 0\\ 0& 0& 0& 0& 0& I\\ \end{bmatrix}\\ F_i&= \frac{\partial f}{\partial i}=\begin{bmatrix} 0& 0& 0& 0\\ I& 0& 0& 0\\ 0& I& 0& 0\\ 0& 0& I& 0\\ 0& 0& 0& I\\ 0& 0& 0& 0 \end{bmatrix},\quad Q_i= \begin{bmatrix} \mathbf{V_i}& 0& 0& 0\\ 0& \mathbf{\Theta_i}& 0& 0\\ 0& 0& \mathbf{A_i}& 0\\ 0& 0& 0& \mathbf{\Omega_i} \end{bmatrix}\\ 其中：\mathbf{V_i}&=\Delta t^2\sigma_{\eta_a}^2 \mathbf{I}加速度计测量噪声\\ \mathbf{\Theta_i}&=\Delta t^2\sigma_{\eta_g}^2\mathbf{I}角速度计测量噪声\\ \mathbf{A_i}&=\Delta t\sigma_{\eta_{ba}}^2\mathbf{I}加速度计bias随机游走噪声\\ \mathbf{\Omega_i}&=\Delta t\sigma_{\eta_{bg}}^2\mathbf{I}角速度计bias随机游走噪声 \end{align} \] 2. 融合IMU和其它传感器 ¶ 在之前的推导中，IMU给出了ESKF的预测部分。其它传感器(GPS, vision)产生的信息用于修正滤波器，分为三步： observation of the error-state via filter correction, injection of the observed errors into the nominal state reset of the error-state 3. observation of the error-state via filter correction ¶ 假设传感器状态方程： \[ y=h(x_t)+v \] 其中 \(v \sim \mathcal{N}(0,V)\) 根据修正方程有: \[ \begin{align} K&=PH^\top(HPH^\top +V)^{-1}\\ \hat{\delta x} &\leftarrow K(y-h(\hat{x_t}))\\ P &\leftarrow (I-KH)P\\ H &= \left.\frac{\partial h}{\partial \delta x_t}\right|_x \end{align} \] 原本需要H在 \(x_t\) 处展开，由于 \(\hat{x_t}=x \oplus \hat{\delta x}\) ，而此时误差状态的期望为0（还未观测误差状态）,因此可认为 \(\hat{x_t}=x\) 并在x处展开。 Warning \(P \leftarrow (I-KH)P\) 是最简单的协方差更新形式，但数值稳定性方面不好，可以使用更加稳定的形式： 1. \(P \leftarrow P - K(HPH^\top+V)K^\top\) (symmetric form) 2. \(P \leftarrow (I-KH)P(I-KH)^\top+KVK^\top\) (symmetric and positive Joseph form) 3.1 雅可比H的计算 ¶ \[ \begin{align} H &= \left.\frac{\partial h}{\partial \delta x_t}\right|_x\\ &= \left.\frac{\partial h}{\partial x_t}\right|_x \left.\frac{\partial x_t}{\partial \delta x}\right|_x =H_x X_{\delta x}\\ X_{\delta x} &= \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial (p+\delta p) }{\partial \delta p}\\ &\frac{\partial (v+\delta v) }{\partial \delta v}\\ &&\frac{\partial (q\otimes\delta q) }{\partial \delta \theta}\\ &&&\frac{\partial (bias_a+\delta bias_a) }{\partial \delta bias_a}\\ &&&&\frac{\partial (bias_g+\delta bias_g) }{\partial \delta bias_g}\\ &&&&&\frac{\partial (g+\delta g) }{\partial \delta g} \end{bmatrix}\\ &= \begin{bmatrix} \mathbf{I}_3\\ &\mathbf{I}_3\\ &&\mathbf{Q}_{\delta \theta}\\ &&&\mathbf{I}_3\\ &&&&\mathbf{I}_3\\ &&&&&\mathbf{I}_3 \end{bmatrix}\\ \mathbf{Q}_{\delta \theta} &\triangleq \left.\frac{\partial (q\otimes\delta q) }{\partial \delta \theta}\right|_q\\ &=\left.\frac{\partial (q\otimes\delta q) }{\partial \delta q}\right|_q\left.\frac{\partial \delta q }{\partial \delta \theta}\right|_{\hat{\delta \theta}=0}\\ &=Q_L \cdot \frac{\partial \begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix} }{\partial \delta \theta}\\ &=Q_L \cdot \frac{1}{2} \begin{bmatrix} 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}= \frac{1}{2}\begin{bmatrix} -q_x & -q_y & -q_z \\ q_w & -q_z & q_y \\ q_z & q_w & -q_x\\ -q_y & q_x & q_w \end{bmatrix} \end{align} \] 4. Injection of the observed errors into the nominal state ¶ \[ \begin{align} p & \leftarrow p + \hat{\delta p}\\ v &\leftarrow v+\hat{\delta v}\\ q&\leftarrow q \otimes quaternion\{\hat{\delta \theta}\}=q \otimes \hat{\delta q}\\ bias_{a}&\leftarrow bias_{a} + \hat{\delta bias_{a}}\\ bias_{g}&\leftarrow bias_{g} + \hat{\delta bias_{g}}\\ g &\leftarrow g + \hat{\delta g}\\ \end{align} \] 5. ESKF reset ¶ \[ \begin{align} \delta x &\leftarrow g( \delta x) = \delta x \ominus \hat{\delta x} \approx G \delta x\\ \hat{\delta x} &\leftarrow 0\\ P &\leftarrow GPG^\top\\ G & \triangleq \left.\frac{\partial g}{\partial \delta x}\right|_{\hat{\delta x}}\\ &=\begin{bmatrix} \mathbf{I}_6\\ &\mathbf{I}-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta \theta}]_{\times}\\ &&\mathbf{I}_9 \end{bmatrix} \end{align} \] reset的雅可比G的计算 G中唯一需要计算的就是g关于四元数误差的部分，我们需要先用reset之前的旧状态 \(q_t\) 表示reset之后的新状态 \(q_t^+\) ，reset的操作并不会改变状态变量的值，因此有： \[ \begin{align} q_t^+&=q_t\\ 由定义: q^+ &\otimes \delta q^+=q \otimes \delta q\\ 又： q^+ &=q \otimes \hat{\delta q}\\ 因此：(q \otimes \hat{\delta q})\otimes \delta q^+&=q\otimes \delta q \\ \delta q^+&=(q \otimes \hat{\delta q})^* \otimes q\otimes \delta q \\ &=\hat{\delta q}^* \otimes q^* \otimes q\otimes \delta q \\ &=\hat{\delta q}^*\otimes \delta q =[\hat{\delta q}^*]_L \delta q\\ 由于：\hat{\delta q}^*&\approx \begin{bmatrix} 1\\-\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix}\\ 代入：\begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta^+ \end{bmatrix} &=\begin{bmatrix} 1 & \frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}^\top\\ -\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta} & I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix}\\ \Rightarrow \begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta^+ \end{bmatrix} &=\begin{bmatrix} 1 +\frac{1}{4}\hat{\delta\theta}^\top\delta\theta\\ -\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}+(I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times})\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix}\\ \Rightarrow \delta\theta^+ &=-\hat{\delta\theta}+(I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times})\delta\theta\\ \frac{\partial \delta\theta^+}{\partial \delta\theta} &=I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times} \end{align} \] 6. 总结 F_i^\top\\ \end{align} \] 当额外信息返回时（如GPS，vision等）需要： 修正误差状态，即修正步： \[ \begin{align} K&=PH^\top(HPH^\top +V)^{-1}\\ \hat{\delta x} &\leftarrow K(y-h(\hat{x_t}))\\ P &\leftarrow (I-KH)P\\ \end{align} \] docs.title: 1. ESKF 预测方程

docs.text: 在之前的推导中，IMU给出了ESKF的预测部分。其它传感器(GPS, vision)产生的信息用于修正滤波器，分为三步： observation of the error-state via filter correction, injection of the observed errors into the nominal state reset of the error-state
docs.title: 2. 融合IMU和其它传感器

docs.text: 假设传感器状态方程： \[ y=h(x_t)+v \] 其中 \(v \sim \mathcal{N}(0,V)\) 根据修正方程有: \[ \begin{align} K&=PH^\top(HPH^\top +V)^{-1}\\ \hat{\delta x} &\leftarrow K(y-h(\hat{x_t}))\\ P &\leftarrow (I-KH)P\\ H &= \left.\frac{\partial h}{\partial \delta x_t}\right|_x \end{align} \] 原本需要H在 \(x_t\) 处展开，由于 \(\hat{x_t}=x \oplus \hat{\delta x}\) ，而此时误差状态的期望为0（还未观测误差状态）,因此可认为 \(\hat{x_t}=x\) 并在x处展开。 Warning \(P \leftarrow (I-KH)P\) 是最简单的协方差更新形式，但数值稳定性方面不好，可以使用更加稳定的形式： 1. \(P \leftarrow P - K(HPH^\top+V)K^\top\) (symmetric form) 2. \(P \leftarrow (I-KH)P(I-KH)^\top+KVK^\top\) (symmetric and positive Joseph form)
docs.title: 3. observation of the error-state via filter correction

docs.text: \[ \begin{align} H &= \left.\frac{\partial h}{\partial \delta x_t}\right|_x\\ &= \left.\frac{\partial h}{\partial x_t}\right|_x \left.\frac{\partial x_t}{\partial \delta x}\right|_x =H_x X_{\delta x}\\ X_{\delta x} &= \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial (p+\delta p) }{\partial \delta p}\\ &\frac{\partial (v+\delta v) }{\partial \delta v}\\ &&\frac{\partial (q\otimes\delta q) }{\partial \delta \theta}\\ &&&\frac{\partial (bias_a+\delta bias_a) }{\partial \delta bias_a}\\ &&&&\frac{\partial (bias_g+\delta bias_g) }{\partial \delta bias_g}\\ &&&&&\frac{\partial (g+\delta g) }{\partial \delta g} \end{bmatrix}\\ &= \begin{bmatrix} \mathbf{I}_3\\ &\mathbf{I}_3\\ &&\mathbf{Q}_{\delta \theta}\\ &&&\mathbf{I}_3\\ &&&&\mathbf{I}_3\\ &&&&&\mathbf{I}_3 \end{bmatrix}\\ \mathbf{Q}_{\delta \theta} &\triangleq \left.\frac{\partial (q\otimes\delta q) }{\partial \delta \theta}\right|_q\\ &=\left.\frac{\partial (q\otimes\delta q) }{\partial \delta q}\right|_q\left.\frac{\partial \delta q }{\partial \delta \theta}\right|_{\hat{\delta \theta}=0}\\ &=Q_L \cdot \frac{\partial \begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix} }{\partial \delta \theta}\\ &=Q_L \cdot \frac{1}{2} \begin{bmatrix} 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}= \frac{1}{2}\begin{bmatrix} -q_x & -q_y & -q_z \\ q_w & -q_z & q_y \\ q_z & q_w & -q_x\\ -q_y & q_x & q_w \end{bmatrix} \end{align} \]

docs.text: \[ \begin{align} \delta x &\leftarrow g( \delta x) = \delta x \ominus \hat{\delta x} \approx G \delta x\\ \hat{\delta x} &\leftarrow 0\\ P &\leftarrow GPG^\top\\ G & \triangleq \left.\frac{\partial g}{\partial \delta x}\right|_{\hat{\delta x}}\\ &=\begin{bmatrix} \mathbf{I}_6\\ &\mathbf{I}-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta \theta}]_{\times}\\ &&\mathbf{I}_9 \end{bmatrix} \end{align} \] reset的雅可比G的计算 G中唯一需要计算的就是g关于四元数误差的部分，我们需要先用reset之前的旧状态 \(q_t\) 表示reset之后的新状态 \(q_t^+\) ，reset的操作并不会改变状态变量的值，因此有： \[ \begin{align} q_t^+&=q_t\\ 由定义: q^+ &\otimes \delta q^+=q \otimes \delta q\\ 又： q^+ &=q \otimes \hat{\delta q}\\ 因此：(q \otimes \hat{\delta q})\otimes \delta q^+&=q\otimes \delta q \\ \delta q^+&=(q \otimes \hat{\delta q})^* \otimes q\otimes \delta q \\ &=\hat{\delta q}^* \otimes q^* \otimes q\otimes \delta q \\ &=\hat{\delta q}^*\otimes \delta q =[\hat{\delta q}^*]_L \delta q\\ 由于：\hat{\delta q}^*&\approx \begin{bmatrix} 1\\-\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix}\\ 代入：\begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta^+ \end{bmatrix} &=\begin{bmatrix} 1 & \frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}^\top\\ -\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta} & I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix}\\ \Rightarrow \begin{bmatrix} 1\\\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta^+ \end{bmatrix} &=\begin{bmatrix} 1 +\frac{1}{4}\hat{\delta\theta}^\top\delta\theta\\ -\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}+(I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times})\frac{1}{2}\delta\theta \end{bmatrix}\\ \Rightarrow \delta\theta^+ &=-\hat{\delta\theta}+(I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times})\delta\theta\\ \frac{\partial \delta\theta^+}{\partial \delta\theta} &=I-[\frac{1}{2}\hat{\delta\theta}]_{\times} \end{align} \]

docs.text: 1. 概率密度函数 ¶ p(x)为x在区间[a,b]上的概率密度函数，Pr为x在区间[c,d]上的概率: $$ \begin{align} \int_a^b p(x)dx&=1,x \in [a,b]\\ Pr(c \leq x \leq d)&=\int_c^d p(x)dx \end{align} $$ \(x \in [a,b]\) , \(y \in [r,s]\) ,联合概率： \[ \int_a^b\int_r^s p(x,y)dydx=1 \] 当x,y为独立变量， \(p(x,y)=p(x)p(y)\) 2. 条件概率密度 ¶ x关于条件y的条件概率密度函数: \(p(x|y)\) , 并满足： $$ p(x)=\int_r^s p(x|y)p(y) dy $$ 3. 贝叶斯公式 ¶ \[ p(x,y)=p(x|y)p(y)=p(y|x)p(x) \Rightarrow p(x|y)=\dfrac{p(y|x)p(x)}{p(y)} \] 4. 贝叶斯推断 ¶ 已知先验概率密度函数p(x),和传感器模型 \(p(y|x)\) , 可得后验概率密度: $$ p(x|y)=\dfrac{p(y|x)p(x)}{p(y)}=\dfrac{p(y|x)p(x)}{\int p(y|x)p(x) dx} $$ 5. 高斯概率密度函数 ¶ 5.1 一维情况 ¶ \[ p(x|\mu,\sigma^2)=\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi \sigma^2}}exp(-\dfrac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}) \] 5.2 多维情况 ¶ \[ p(x|\mu,\Sigma)=\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{(2\pi)^N det(\Sigma)}}exp(-\frac{1}{2}(x-\mu)^\top \Sigma^{-1} (x-\mu)) \] 6. 联合高斯概率密度函数 ¶ \[ \begin{align} p(x)&=N(\mu_x,\Sigma_{xx})\\ p(y)&=N(\mu_y,\Sigma_{yy})\\ p(x,y)&=N( \begin{bmatrix} \mu_x\\ \mu_y \end{bmatrix},\begin{bmatrix} \Sigma_{xx} &\Sigma_{xy}\\ \Sigma_{yx} &\Sigma_{yy} \end{bmatrix})=p(x|y)p(y) \end{align} \] 舒尔补 \[ \begin{align} &\begin{bmatrix} A & B\\ C & D \end{bmatrix}= \begin{bmatrix} I & BD^{-1}\\ 0 & I \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \Delta D & 0\\ 0 & D \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} I & 0\\ D^{-1}C & I \end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix} \Delta D+BD^{-1}C & B\\ C & D \end{bmatrix}\\ &\text{舒尔补:}\Delta D = A-BD^{-1}C\\ &\text{原矩阵的逆:}\\ &\begin{bmatrix} A & B\\ C & D \end{bmatrix}^{-1}= \begin{bmatrix} I & 0\\ -D^{-1}C & I \end{bmatrix}\begin{bmatrix} \Delta D^{-1} & 0\\ 0 & D^{-1} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} I & -BD^{-1}\\ 0 & I \end{bmatrix} \end{align} \] 利用舒尔补求方差矩阵的逆: $$ \begin{bmatrix} \Sigma_{xx} & \Sigma_{xy}\\ \Sigma_{yx} & \Sigma_{yy} \end{bmatrix}^{-1}= \begin{bmatrix} I & 0\\ -\Sigma_{yy}^{-1}\Sigma_{yx} & I \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \Delta \Sigma^{-1} & 0\\ 0 & \Sigma_{yy}^{-1} \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} I & -\Sigma_{xy}\Sigma_{yy}^{-1}\\ 0 & I \end{bmatrix} $$ \(\Delta \Sigma =\Sigma_{xx}-\Sigma_{xy}\Sigma_{yy}^{-1}\Sigma_{yx}\)
